review:
It's great. All I wanted was a game I could play with an xbone controller that was dedicated to helicopters; this is it. It's got plenty of content to come back to it, workshop missions and stuff, honestly I liked the campaign, it was simple but just written so you feel like you're doing important stuff. You have a lot of medevac missions and a lot of "provide air support" missions. 

I personally think the game is well designed, from a game design perspective. It's not high budget--it's designed to be fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025220099', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1678009808}
review:
ゲーム性は悪くないがレベルデザインに問題がある

ゲーム中盤、敵施設破壊ミッション後半で仲間のヘリが墜落、迫りくる敵兵(おそらく100人ぐらい？)を迎え撃てというミッションが発生します
銃弾の雨が降ろうが絨毯爆撃をしようが敵兵は仲間のヘリへまっしぐら、耐久力等は存在せず敵兵が仲間のヘリに到着した段階でゲームオーバーです

この時私は前半の敵施設破壊で弾薬をかなり使っており機銃とロケットが6発だけという状況でした
他のレビューにもある通り敵兵の当たり判定は極小でとてもじゃないがほぼ機銃オンリーの状態ではクリア不能、改めて前半部分からやり直すことになりました
リトライ時にHP弾薬全回復する仕様だったら初めからやり直さずに済んだのにね

この程度の状況は想定できる範囲だと思うんですが問題ないと考えたんでしょうか
お前の腕が悪いと言われればそれまでですが、後半のミッションがあるから弾薬を節約しよう被弾しないようにしようと考えながら一度やったミッションを再走するのは爽快感も楽しさも無い非常に苦痛な時間でした

題材、プレイフィールは悪くないだけに惜しいです
定価買いはお勧めしませんがセール時ならアリかと思います

review:
Quite a good game, the Solo campaign is quite short, yet immersive enough, very customisable difficulty and controls. The lasting fun in this game comes from the Mission Editor and the Multiplayer mode.

The inclusion of DLCs bring new fun to the game (Ka-50, Mi-28 and Mi-8 bring new loadouts and thus new ways to play, without being completely overpowered), the game is perfectly playable as a base product.

Recomended to anyone who likes soviet tech or just helicopters.

review:
卡50我的超人，你让我在一款名为雌鹿的游戏中爱上了黑鲨，再见了大肚子的气泡歪脑袋，我去找共轴反桨双旋翼了。话说有没有一丝丝可能，以后出一款加入卡52或者美系武直的游戏啊（您要找的是不是HB或者WT？）。
话说回来雌鹿还是蛮不错的，就是没卵用的座舱有点遗憾，以及其中几个任务不知道是不是制作组脑子抽了想出来的，30mm机炮愣是打出了minigun的效果，以及神奇的挂架布撒器（这个我是真的没见过），但作为街机模拟还是很不错的啦！

author: {'steamid': '76561198235958372', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1641227405}
review:
ニッチなヘリゲー自体少なくこのゲームを見つけて時はワクワクした
始めの数ミッションはとても楽しかった
理想とするヘリ動きをしながら地上にいる敵をミサイルと機銃掃射で圧倒する
まさに求めているゲームだった
が、進めていくにつれ文句を言いたい箇所が多く出てきた


1.機銃やミサイルの殺傷範囲が小さすぎる
爆風などの概念がなく歩兵の真横にミサイルが着弾しても普通に生きている
さらに機銃の判定はさらにシビアで歩兵を倒そうと思ったら直撃させなければならない
これに加え敵の体力が微妙に多く、装甲車などの車両はミサイルを5.6発撃ち込んで撃破できる程度である
映画などでよく見る前傾になりながら高速で接近、一気に縦列爆撃しようとすると殆どの敵が残っている

2.作業ゲー感が強い
上記にあるように敵が倒しにくい上多くのミッションに時間制限がある
（無くても○○が破壊される前に敵を倒せ等の実質時間制限あり）
そのせいでロールプレイをするなど遊び方を工夫をしようとしてもミッション失敗になり
結局殆どは静止して適当にミサイルをばらばらまく→近づいて残った敵にチマチマ少しずつ攻撃をするになりがちである
結果なんの爽快感もない作業ゲー感が出てしまう

3.理不尽かつ単調なミッションがある
これは完全に個人的な主観だがこれが低評価の最も大きい原因である
ストアページのスクリーンショットにもありそう言うミッションもあると承知はしていたがこれが如何せん理不尽で単調
まずこのミッションはシングルモードでトータルで3ステージある
大まかな内容はヘリを操縦していたら突然視点が変わりFPS視点で戦わされる
やることは非常にシンプルで勝手に動くヘリの爆速感度でかつ精度ガバガバドアガンのみで敵歩兵を倒すのみ(20~30人)
                                                             　　　(↑自分に問題があるのかもしれないが感度が変更出来なかった)
当然1.で書いたように当たり判定は厳しい
それに重ねてミッションによっては攻撃してはいけないオブジェクトがある
そのオブジェクトの僅かな隙間にいる敵を倒さなければならない
当然攻撃してはいけないオブジェクトに当たればミッション失敗となる
そんな状況で爆速感度ガバガバ精度の機銃で易々とクリアできるはずもなく
理不尽なリトライを大量にする羽目になる

以上がこのゲームをやってみての感想である
レビュー全体を通して酷評のように見える(実際にプレイしてかなりストレスを感じる場面は)あるが
カジュアルに遊べてほぼヘリで構成された、数少ない貴重なゲームであり
作戦にあった装備を考えたり、TPS視点でカッコイイ機体を見たり、やコックピット視点のリアルな操縦ができたりと
面白い要素も沢山ある

review:
Pretty solid little title, I do wish I could find people to attempt to see if Co-op still is functional in this game via the online mode as when i checked, no servers are visible. 

The MI-24 was always one of those aircraft I really loved, especially after seeing it in Rambo, and featured in other media over the years, as the idea of this helicopter reminds me of the sci fi "Dropship" vehicle role. Heavily armored, and decently armed, and still able to get troops in and out of combat while providing close air support. 

I will say, It's a shame this company couldn't get there hands on a license to use the Halo IP, and create a Pelican Dropship /. Gunship game with very similar gameplay to this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078935755', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1650411544}
review:
A nice arcade-leaning "simulation" game.

You get to fly an MI-24 hind, the Russian flying tank.
You will be tasked with a range of objectives in singleplayer, ranging from destroying enemy convoys, to full on assault and defence, as well as get to destroy your friends in multiplayer, if you manage to get it up and running.
The game might feel clunky at times, but it makes up for it with the fact that you can get it dirt cheap nowadays.
The game also features controller support, so if you're boasting a flight stick, feel free to mess around.

It's just something nice to have on your computer, or laptop, in order to play and wind down from time to time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048109515', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1640834369}
review:
The Mil Mi-24 Hind is my favourite Soviet/Russian attack helicopter.  It looks like a heavily armed tank that flies.  (Soviet/Russian pilots actually called/call it the “flying tank).  It also looks like an angry dragon waiting to pounce.  Hopefully, one day I’ll be able to hitch a ride in one.  Until that day arrives, I’ll have to settle for video games that let you fly Hind helicopters.  Thankfully, Air Missions: Hind answers that call.
-
The game offers several modes: Campaign, Instant Action, Test Flight, Missions from Map Editor, and Multiplayer.  The developers also added three more Russian helicopters for you to fly: HAVOC, HIP, & HOKUM.  So far, I completed the Campaign & Instant Action modes with the Hind because . . . it’s the Hind.  I’ll most likely play through both modes again with the other helicopters to see how they handle.
-
You’re able to customize your chosen helicopter before starting a mission.  You choose your camo scheme, level of difficulty, and weapon layouts.  Even though there’re a variety of weapons to choose from, most of the time, you’ll end up using the large unguided rockets, machine guns, and AT-2 Swatter missiles (Russian equivalent of Hellfire missiles).  Would have been nice if the heavy bombs had more impact & damage on certain enemy objects, like ships.
-
The Hind handles well with a mouse & keyboard, but it’ll take some time to get used to it.  I think the game also supports joysticks.  The graphics are really good.  You fly/fight during the dawn, day, dusk, and night.  There are weather effects such as, rain, fog, & blizzard.  The Russian dialogue is English subtitled.  There is one mission where you hear a gunner make fun of American equipment malfunctioning. I think this is to get back at all the jokes Hollywood makes about Russian made equipment not working in movies & tv shows.
-
The combat itself is okay, but the thing that bothers me are the air-to-air battles with enemy helicopters.  It devolves into ascending & descending, and spinning battles.  I wonder if it’s like that in real life?  There is one air-to-air battle involving MiG fighters and wow do they fly fast and in a kamikaze mood!  When you’re targeting stationary objects like buildings, the game will only accept a pinpoint precise hit before letting you proceed.  On the plus side, there are a few times where you turn into a side gunner, using a machine gun to shoot enemy infantry while the computer flies the helicopter.  There is mission variety, but I feel the missions themselves don’t last long enough.
-
I know Air Missions: Hind is 5 years old and the developers, 3DIVISION, is focusing all its efforts on its latest game, Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic (also a great early access game!), but it would be nice if they could return to AM:H and release new content.  AM:H still has potential to be an amazing game.  Right now, it’s enjoyable.

review: As a Soviet myself, this was a must-buy and I'm very happy with it. A power fantasy with cool explosions, a nice selection of iconic Soviet gunships (albeit DLC) to fly and an accessible control scheme that anyone can use without any problems. It's also a nice touch that the dialog is in Russian by-default as it adds to authenticity. The campaign, although "fictional" still feels real enough for me, and therefore, more authentic and fun to blast through - reliving famous Soviet conflicts from the air. (I HATE FICTIONAL COUNTRY NAMES AND MADE-UP LANGUAGES) Instant action is insanely fun with DragonForce on the stereo and a can of something caffeinated. Overall, this is a simulator but an accessible one - you will take-off and blow things up in no time - no manual study required. P.S Go watch ЧЕРНАЯ АКУЛА/BLACK SHARK to truly see how deadly the KA50 Hokum A is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198807469301', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1578338285}
review:
Idly browsing my library, I noticed that this is on the wishlists of some friends, so thought I should post a review and maybe save you a few quid. ;)

As I know you all from Heliborne, I guess you are looking for more of the same (or at least similar). Unfortunately, this is worse in every regard and I wouldn't buy it, even on sale.

- The graphics aren't terrible, but do show the game's console pedigree, as does the clunky UI.
- The HUD, gameplay and flight model are more arcade/less sim, than HB.
- Few maps, few helo, few missions.
- Steam charts show an average of 2/3 players, so multiplayer is dead (peak of ~30 in 2018).
- The devs moved on in 2018 and Steam forums are lifeless.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009829655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1608152251}
review: It's an arcade game with enough simulator traits to make it enjoyable for both action and simulator fans alike. The helicopter handles as well as I can imagine and the targeting hud works well without being too arcade/easy. The graphics look a little dated by today's standards but the movement and controls are extremely good. It feels a bit like Comanche but at half the price. I really enjoy playing this but now I've completed all the levels I'm finding it a bit repetitive. I win each mission using the same tactics as I'm replaying it after only a few hours. I'd love to see a 'Hind 2' with larger maps and more goals on each map, or even a massive single map with multiple missions and off mission units to attack, which is what I loved about Apache/Havoc a few years ago. If you like helicopter warfare, this game is one of the better ones although it is a bit more arcade shooter than simulator.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998896484', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1671647001}
review:
отличная игра, отличный баланс между симом и аркадой. В режиме управления "пилот" есть ощущение летящей наковальни, с массой и инерцией. Можно получить удовольствие от виражей и полета на высоте 5-10 метров.
Компания местами ОК, но по большей части это именно набор миссий, вылетов. В некоторых миссиях есть пара другая появляющихся по ходу задания. Некоторые же миссии ну оочень топорные.
У игры есть потенциал, и реализован он по большому счету в миссиях где нужно помогать одной толпе техники перебить другую толпу техники. Среди миссий таких ситуаций раз два и обчелся.
Есть редактор миссий, и это круто, т.к. в них умельцы сделали масштабные сражения, в т.ч. с необходимостью посадки для перезарядки оружия.
Было бы круто если бы авторы сделали DLC с масштабной компанией, с масштабными же боями, что бы в каждом бою можно было задействовать все типы вооружения против всех типов врагов, с побочными заданиями по спасению своих, или уничтожению приоритетных целей за отведенное время, и т.д.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071575276', 'num_games_owned': 626, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 483, 'last_played': 1604424888}
review:
Вполне себе годная аркада на вертолётиках. В частности на Ми 24 "Крокодил" (есть и другие, включая хайпанутую "Черную акулу" Ка-50, но Без Ка-52).

Честное окружение, разлетающееся в щепки. Честные машины. Честные самолёты и вертолёты. Честные "жирные" танки. И честные хрупкие пехи складывающие сотни от близко пролетающего крупного калибра. 

Играется аркадно, но с полным погружением. Звуки, озвучка (в том числи и на русском!), механика боя - всё очень продумано. По началу только тупанул с перезарядкой (на Q) не учел, что она под весь боекомплект расчитана а не только на текущий выбранный подвес - из за чего порой не хватало БК на некоторые миссии. Но когда разобрался и стал вести себя более тщательно - мир преобразился. 

В целом отличная игра, то чего от неё ожидал она дала и даже больше: в игре есть редактор миссий! и наполненная мастерская! Оружие "как настоящее", да что там - настоящее. Хотя бить "воздух-воздух" по танкам без прицела можно - их они не пробивают почти вообще. Но в целом можно даже ознакомиться с описанием пушек, снарядов и ракет. Подвесы конфигурируются, но для полного удовольствия рекомендую вешать больше НАРов))) Тогда такой феерверк летит, что душа радуется.

В общем вот прям всем всем я бы игру советовать и не стал. Но тем, кто искал "про вертолётики" - обязательно к освоению. Даже если вы обыгрались миссии на Армах - здесь вы всё равно найдете развлечение. И эта игра уж точно в разы лучше "симулятора" [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/65730/Take_On_Helicopters/]ToH[/url], в котором "крокодил" доступен только в ДЛЦ (за доп. плату). А редактор хоть и есть (и он по наследству от Армы довольно таки мощный), мастерской то нет (т.е. что бы покатать в пользовательские миссии их еще нужно найти, скачать и куда то там распаковать...)

В общем от этой игрули (Air Missions: HIND) я честно кайфанул, а от ToH схватил неилюззорный криндж за разрабов некогда "великой" игры (flashpoint).

author: {'steamid': '76561197980548605', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 981, 'last_played': 1594274820}
review:
На деле сильно не хочется ругать эту игру. Потому что в целом не за что.

Однако все же стоит отметить пару вещей. 

Во-первых это ни разу не симулятор. Даже в реликтовых Команчах и Вервольфах вам могли сломать двигатель, повредить рулевое управление, отбить пулемет. Здесь просто здоровье в процентах. Те, кто сравнивают эту игру с аркадной серией Страйков куда ближе к истине.

Но с другой стороны, как аркада, эта игра пытается, и иногда успешно, делать все правильно. В игре простое управление на освоение которого у вас уйдет минут десять с учетом того, что осваивать его придется в тренировочных миссиях, вплетенных в кампанию. Собственно картинка, даже на малых настройках вполне прилична и даже иногда радует глаз. Кругом все дымит, блестит, взрывается и т.п.

Второй, и на этот раз именно проблемой, является то, что в игре крайне мало миссий как в кампании, так и отдельных. Да и проходятся все они минут за пять каждая. Вылети из точки А в точку Б, там всех уничтожь, как вариант за определенное время. По праздникам вам придется заморачиваться со взлетом и посадкой. По большим праздникам вам придется брать кого-нибудь на борт. Какой-либо процедурной генерации не предусмотрено. Все цели всегда будут одни и те же, противники и союзники будут двигаться по одному маршруту.

О сюжете сказать нечего. По сути вы просто участвуете в вооруженных конфликтах на узнаваемых локациях. Но это совсем не было бы проблемой, если бы не общая пустота игры.

Если в двух словах, то игр имеет отличный потенциал, но абсолютно не хочет его раскрывать. Бодрые аркадные пострелюшки с полетушками соседствуют с чудовищным однообразием.

Исправить это дело призван встроенный в игру редактор. Вполне понятный и функциональный редактор. Хотя хочется отметить, что позиция "вот заготовка и инструменты, доделай все сам" - не сильно подбивает к покупке игры.

Если вам хочется позалипать в редакторе, поклепать миссии и т.п., то эту игру стоит брать, она в вас нуждается.

Если хочется погонять несколько на российских вертолетах в несложную аркаду, то тоже не сомневайтесь и берите со всеми DLC.

В остальном - строго опционально.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970068504', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1594012063}
review:
As much as I had to force myself to enjoy this - at the end of the day I simply couldn't.  Having flown arcade style  choppers since Battlefield Vietnam onward (with thousands of hours logged), as well as games such as Homefront, Enemy Engaged 2, and Rising Storm Vietnam - this thing was just an utter, disappointing mess.

-Sloppy flight-model (on Pilot difficulty). It's not difficult, but neither is it rewarding.
-Useless AI. Enemy AI pose no threat. Teammate AI are more of a threat to you than the enemy (collision/friendly fire risk).
-Laughable missile evasion "tactics" consisting of pop a single flare and move 2 inches to your left. Missile evaded even while hovering still afterwards.
-Simplistic mission structure with absolutely no sense of continuity between them.
-Most interesting choppers pay-walled behind DLC - and even then can't be used on most missions due to loadout restrictions.
-DOF/FXAA gives that hazy/blurry look to all the visuals that makes it seem like your pilot may need some thick glasses.

The TLDR - A lazy attempt at bringing back that good old Enemy Engaged feel that fails on all but the most basic of fronts.  Possibly worth it at the $5 mark, anymore than that and you're better off looking elsewhere for your helo kicks.

review: Die "Hubis" fliegen treulich in unseren Händen und helfen dabei den Sieg davonzutragen. Das ist auch grafisch hübsch anzusehen, ich sehe auch kein Problem darin, wenn bei einer Explosion nicht das herumfliegende Kochgeschirr der betroffenen Soldaten zu erkennen ist. Das kann man sich ja denken. Es macht jedenfalls Spaß und ist kein Arcade-Unsinn. Natürlich muss man im Felde z.B. zum Nachladen eigentlich kurz landen, aber das kann man auch im Spiel tun, wenn man es will. Ich sehe an diesem Spiel keine wirklichen Defizite. Es macht großen Spaß, endlich ein mehr als würdiger Nachfolger für das über 20 Jahre alte "Hind". Auch Mi-8 fliegen zu können rundet die Sache ganz wesentlich ab. Die 3 Euro mehr (Deluxe-Version) sind gut in Spielspaß angelegt.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995043046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1590507910}
review:
All is have to say is "WOW!". This is an AWESOME action combat flight simulator game. If you guys have played Comanche 4 then you will LOVE this. 

The helicopters are so easy to fly using the casual but if you want a challenge then you can always change it before each mission. What I really LOVE about it is the load out mission where you can configure your helicopter and settings. Like every game you have to give it time to adjust but for me this is one of the BEST action helicopter combat flight simulator. One thing is that it has a mission editor. 

Also I would like to add, I have played all campaigns, missions and customs mission (Air Missions: HIND) using Keyboard and Mouse. Joystick is not required but is a bonus if you want to use it. 

                                                                         TRY IT: YOU WILL LOVE IT

Keep up the excellent work 3Division. I hope they create a good arcade flight simulator with ATC, different planes like 747, Airbus etc but use the same engine. Yes, you do have Microsoft Flight Simulator and XPlane but one needs a good joystick and a good medium/high end Spec PC

review:
Air Missions: Hind is one of those easy to use flight sims that do not compromise realism.
If you are a helicopter flight sim fan this game is a must for you.
The flight dynamics can be adjusted to suit your playstyle from arcade to flight sim.
To maximize your playtime experience, get all the DLCs, which will allow you to fly three other helicopters: Ka-50 Hokum, Mi-8 Hip, and the Mi-28 Havoc.
On a last note, I would compare this with Buka's Fair Strike without the difficulty of trying looking for your mission.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140264010', 'num_games_owned': 1199, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1585028598}
review:
Редко ставлю отрицательные отзывы, но это тот случай.

1. Это не симулятор, а если угодно, аркадный симулятор. Все что вам нужно это нажимать W и S, что бы подниматься вверх и спускаться вниз. Мышью рулить направление и тангаж, A и D  крен.  ВСЕ. Это симулятор? Серьезно?  Играл на режиме Пилот и Сложно.  Управление машиной тяжелое  в плане того, что она туго доворачивает и надо зарание прикинуть свой маневр. Это хорошо. Но проецирующийся боевой интерфейс который ты перестаешь видеть когда задираешь нос? Или целеуказатель на земле к фабам который ты не видишь пока не задерешь нос достаточно вниз?  А в кабине пилота прицел для фабов вообще проецируется на самой кабине.  В симуляторе, все это должно делаться через прицел кабины! или если угодно, в режиме вроде тепловизионного который в игре есть. (чтоб вы знали, типловизоры на МИ  очень мутные, а у вас просто нанесение сигнатуры на тот же вижен)
2.  Товарищ!  Вы осуществляете операции в 80м году на русских боевых машинах. Но вот не задача. Пехота вокруг почему-то американская.
3.  Это скорее к первому пункту, но напишу отдельно.  Последней каплей стала первая же миссия по эвакуации. 
а.  Она проходится через механику скрипта где вам дают станковый пулемет на борту и вы поливаете из него пол сотни вражеских солдат когда в вас они все стреляют, да еще и крупнокалиберные пулеметы у них есть на тачанках.  НИКОГДА такой фигни вертолет сделать не сможет и не будет!
б.  На посадке, мой вертолет постоянно откатывался назад и задевал кусты.  Это просто недостаток управления от третьего лица. Тебе приходится немного задирать нос, что бы видеть, что ты делаешь. Каждый раз когда я садился и куст задевался винтами, я терял 10хп. Мне не жалко, ведь только что в меня кдшилася целая рота, но кустов мой вертолет не выдержал.

author: {'steamid': '76561198243591134', 'num_games_owned': 595, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1653682617}
review:
Не знаток вертолётных симуляторов, но миссии неплохи - комбинируют и реализуют все игровые возможности. Да, аркадно, но весело же! Лучше, чем в любимом в детстве Apache: Air Assault. Есть какой-то сюжет, разные противники и, что самое главное - исключительно Вы выбираете, как выполнять поставленные задачи в 90% вылетов! Ах, как же я обожаю заваливать всё неуправляемыми ракетами С-8! Мечта сбылась! ;-)
Особенно доставляет возможность ограниченного пополнения боекомплекта прямо в воздухе. В итоге: на максимальной сложности приходится пораскинуть мозгами, но управление достаточно простое (как в батлфилде), инерция чувствуется, стрелок-штурмовик присутствует, графон качественный и приятный, союзники в миссиях не для фона - союзные вертолёты не просто создают ощущение участия в крупных операциях, разрушая классическое фантастическое "нагну всех один" - при наличии времени они и сами всех размотают! До полного счастья не хватает только таких же адекватных действий союзных наземных юнитов. 9/10!

author: {'steamid': '76561198034118678', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 591, 'last_played': 1489218848}
review:
来自斯洛伐克的小众独立公司的小众题材作品，似乎还是处女作？画面总体不赖，直升机尤其精美，界面设计上也已尽可能地友好，不似一般中东欧游戏那样根本就是反人类，我猜那些给差评的玩家或许正是因为这些令人意外的优点而不切实际地提高了心理预期才失望的。

不要因为它的画风就用《DC模拟飞行》或者《武装突袭》的标准看待它。飞行射击类游戏本身并不好做，以直升机为操作对象者尤甚。面对题材的缺陷，也许是迫于物质条件限制，也许是有意为之，本游戏开发者干脆基本放弃拟真性和剧情构建，选择专注于驾驶武装直升机本身的乐趣，我认为反而取得了不错的成效！游戏的开火和破坏效果很到位，从空中向各种敌人倾泻火力的感觉颇为舒适。有些关卡确实比较难，打不过也没有关系，因为游戏还提供了自由飞行模式，你可以选择地图，任意翱翔。

这款游戏的本质与十几年前《太平洋英雄》之类的用鼠标驾驶的飞行游戏并无二异。玩的时候不要太较真，不要太用心，甚至也不要特意腾出时间玩。得空进游戏耍一耍，放松放松心情，才是它的最佳使用方式。这是一款休闲游戏，在“休闲”这一点上，它做得很到位！

review:
1、画面不错，优化较好，配置要求不高。
2、毕竟是个射击游戏，虽然模拟程度不高，但座舱还原还可以。
3、任务相对较少，且没啥关联性，建议续作加强游戏故事性及任务之间的关联性。
4、操作比较简单，使用的按键不多，手柄操作感觉很棒。
总体来说这款游戏适合飞行模拟爱好玩家的休闲娱乐，喜欢挑战拟真度的玩家不建议入手。

author: {'steamid': '76561197981896021', 'num_games_owned': 1240, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1575645357}
review:
This is the first game I've ever requested a refund for, and I'll tell you why.

It's just so boring.

I mean, not all games I play are AAA quality, or even close. But most games I can stomach finishing or at least playing a few hours of and then uninstalling. As long as I can get a little entertainment out of something, even if it's bad, I won't ask for a refund.

But this game was just so boring... the controls are horrible. The views are horrible. The missions are horrible. The enemies are horrible.

I just wanted to get in a helicopter and have fun doing helicopter stuff: flying, and shooting. But that is too much to ask for in this case.

I'm really sorry to the developer. Hey, there are others who seem to enjoy it, so I'm glad you're getting purchases.

But for me, this game is very shallow and very boring. I've played many Helicopter games, and enjoy almost all even if they suck. This one made me depressed after 30 minutes. :(

author: {'steamid': '76561198023908056', 'num_games_owned': 859, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1643233746}
review:
This is a mixed arcade/simulation game that works very much on the flying feeling and experience.
It is one of the few flight sims, if not the only one, that wants to recreate the graphical and emotional feeling of flying a war helicopter.
Grass that tremble pushed by the rotor wind, realistic mountains (the game make a large use of the DX11 tessellation feature), Realistic cities, realistic water and pyrotechnic explosions, plenty of clouds, water shock waves when a missile hit the sea, much of beautiful trees and forests, snow and night modes, are the distinctive traits of this game.
For many aspects it is too arcade (no damage model, only health bars), but it "feels" much more immersive than other (old) heli sims like Apache/Havoc or Comanche/Hokum.
Despite the arcade nature, that anyway means fun, the flight model is substantially correct, altough not including effects or features like autorotation or gyroscopic effects (being absent the damage model, the tail rotor will not ever be destroyed, so you never will have to fight against rotor gyro effects physics, and so it is impossible to know if the physics engine support these features), but here too the feeling of piloting a real, heavy war heli is present, and in a massive mode: the inertia is damn good modeled, the helis feels really, really heavy.
For the Deluxe Edition, I really cannot say to have noticed more than slight differences between various helicopters flight characteristics (Mi-24, Mi-8, Mi-28, Ka-50), and this is bad, altough graphically they are superbly realized. Sure the mass of the giant Mi-8 is well perceived, though.
Finally, the flight controls are the same for all helicopters, meaning that there are no interactive instrument panels; this is the biggest unrealistic thing of the game, and is a pity, since the helicopter interiors are graphically excellent.
As for the weapons, there are plenty of them, and they will be gradually unlocked progressing in the main 18 missions campaign. Here we have a better situation: graphically very well modeled and textured, they are also very different in both graphical and damage effects. Wonderful the ability for all the helis to switch to gun control mode, that allows manual gun orientation and targeting while in flight, hovering mode, side gun turret modes, and the support for pilot guided missiles (like AT2-Swatter ones).

The only real problem of an otherwise successful project, is the presence of a single, 18 mission campaign plus 15 single missions. Fortunately there are actually an editor and moreover something like 50 or more mission on Steam Workshop that partially saves this aspect of the game, partially because being realized by hobbyist enthusiast users means that often they are too difficult or having other playability problems. I hope very much that the developers will take into account to add some campaigns in future versions or at least in some further DLC.

Last but not least, the military units present in the game are really few: 4 or few more helis, 1 airplane, some tanks and armored vehicles, some rebel technical trucks, some soldiers, rebel troops, two ships and a submarine. Here too an extension in future versions or DLCs would be very appreciated.

Despite his defects, I liked very much this game: for the first time someone is working in the right way, the immersive one, that, for a 3D videogame, should be the number one feature, but it's not always like this, sadly. And thumbs up also for the joystick recognition and control customization: in five minutes I have configured my old joystick with 6 button, throttle, twist rudder and directional hat, without any trouble.

Finally, multiplayer: I haven't find  players in online battles yet. I'll keep trying.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971800011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1563823659}
review:
I am a flight sim junkie but I also like light on tech high on fun flight games. This is one of those good fun light sims. You can boost it to a semi respectable state of sim, but trust me this game is just for fun. With that in mind I set it up to use a HOTAS system (Stick and throttle) and after messing with bindings I found myself having a great time with this game. It is not at all overly difficult, but its not a walk in the park. There is a level of skill to be had here and it ramps it up nicely. Some missions you will need to go from stick control to mouse control (door gunner) but swapping control is just a couple mouse clicks away. 

Explosions have a nice visual punch, it is always fun to unload a steady stream of missiles and watch the enemy and city crumble and explode. Some missions will test your ability to plan and execute an assault and others will make you take your time and do precise strikes. This is a game you can pick up and play for a quick fix. There are some good quick missions and a decent campaign mode and plenty of choppers to pick from if you get the deluxe version. You unlock most of the weapons half way into the campaign, that is also when things start to ramp up in difficulty. This is quite a fun game, I picked it up on the summer sale and after doing more serious flight sims I cool off with this one for some easy fun with big explosions. This game is a winner!

author: {'steamid': '76561198848823045', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1594909014}
review:
First off, it's an awesome game. It has a both semi-arcade and realistic game by adjusting the difficulty on how you desire.

Compared to Assault Horizon I played, this game offers realistic weapon load with a combination of "mid-air reloading" in campaign or realistic "return to base" reloading in some other game modes I haven't yet tried. It's real; you can fire rockets or missiles as many as you want or realistically glide the missiles in the air like DCS or similar without worrying to reload every shot because it's pre-fixed to fire 4 or 8 shots (with an exception of the machine gun). However, realism means discipline; [b][u]every shot count[/u][/b].

The DLC offers 3 additional helicopters, all Russian-made, to play with. I've tried one of them and I say that, "if I pilot this baby, it's not Air Missions: HIND", but who cares, though?

Unfortunately, despite all goods, this game is a bit unstable. It sometimes crashed to desktop without any explanation why. And Mi-8 in the DLC package somehow is too slow; much more like I play Mi-24 in Assault Horizon that turning it is too difficult (but in this game, Mi-24 turns faster and no need to keep moving the mouse if you want to turn/rotate the helicopter).

There are some other reasons why I found this game interesting, and one of them is how I love the Hind helicopter from documentary videos, mods from other games which reference has been told, being a fan of Ace Combat and have tried the Assault Horizon long before this game was here, and/or have tried some older flight simulator games.

I have a good time playing it and I'll be back again to grind some more. Looking forward to see what will the developer have to do to succeed this awesome game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043421363', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1660143807}
review:
Lange gesucht, endlich gefunden! Ein Helikopterspiel bei dem es sich lohnt den alten verstaubten Joystick hervor zu nehmen. Geile Grafik, etwas fordernde Missionen und ein realistisches Handling. Was will man mehr? Abwechslung? Keine Sorge, die Missionen sind recht abwechslungsreich über Angriff, Verteidigung und sogar Bergung gestaltet. 
 
Als sovietischer Kampfpilot werdet Ihr mit dem Mi-24 Hind vertraut gemacht mit dem Ihr verschiedene Einsätze fliegt, Angriffe unterstützt, Konvois neutralisiert, Gebiete/Einheiten verteidigt, Infanterie zum Zielgebiet transportiert und abgestürzte Piloten oder andere Einheiten evakuieren müsst. Anzumerken ist die Verfügbarkeit von herunterladbaren Inhalten und zusätzlichen Missionen, womit es einem nie langweilig wird. Die Steuerung und Tastenbelegung finde ich persönlich hierbei alles andere als kompliziert und im Vergleich zu anderen Simulatoren noch heilig. 

Und wenn uns die SAM noch nicht erfasst und vom Himmel geholt hat, dann fliegen wir noch heute.

Ganz klar eine Kaufempfehlung!

review:
Air Missions: HIND is actually one of the only games I've ever played that actually gets the controls right. If you use your mouse as a "flight stick," it'll actually work like one. There's no autocorrection to the attitude of the craft like you would find in GTA or AC7. If you point the heli down, it stays down. I really appreciate that.

On top of just liking the "pilot" setting of controls, the game is fun! It took me a little while to understand the helicopter physics, but once I did it was an absolute blast. Play it with a friend and download the steam workshop missions for added challenges and fun! It took maybe a week of trying before we actually beat a series of levels.

Multiplayer servers can be a b**ch to get working and keep running, but other than that I really only have praises for this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996890999', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1550111823}
review:
ガンナー視点の時はホバリングするか低速飛行になってくれるといいなと思いました。

ミサイルを撃とうとすると斜め前(下方向)に加速しながらハインドが落ちていくので移動する戦車とかになかなか直撃させられないです…１キーでホバリングはできるけど、水平より下方向に狙いをつけられなくなるのだけでも何とかできないでしょうか？時間制限のある中でミサイルを使って戦車を次々と倒さないといけないステージ(何回かある)が辛すぎです(どれくらいかというと難易度を「簡単」に落とさざるを得ないくらいに)。


あと、誘爆による敵車両等の連鎖爆発がないため、機銃を使おうがロケット弾を連射しようが全ての敵を一つづつ「狙って」撃たないといけないので非常に作業感が強いです。この辺リアル寄りといえばそうなのでしょうが、片目を閉じて腕を伸ばして箸で豆を拾ってるみたいで(?)とても爽快感がないです。


追記：ただ、このゲームを通しプレイして…漂うある種の”もっさりした感じ”は「(マルチロール機の)ハインドだから」という製作者の意図というか愛…なのかなぁとも思ったりもしてます。ハボックやホーカムだったら(純粋な攻撃ヘリで機敏だろうから)大丈夫なのでしょうか(DLC未購入だからわかりませんが(汗))。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009461724', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1644242808}
review:
As a fan of Russian Military vehicles, this game deliver the goods. You are the pilot of Russian's most iconic combat helicopters, the Mi-24 HIND, Mi-8 HIP, Mi-28 Havoc, Ka-52 HOKUM, and are given a variety of armaments to deal with your target. Weapons like gunpods, light rockets for soft target, heat rockets or massive rocket salvo that wreck tanks, guided weapons that track enemy vehicles. This is also the game that get to drop bombs using a helicopter. 

The game is fun, quite easy to pick up compared to most sims game. You can sutomized how you play, from hilarious complete bouncing from the ground arcade, to extremely lethal collision that instantly wreck your helicopter. This game is more casual friendly, that allows you to either play and have fun, or experience what is like to pilot a helicopter without destroying a million dollar machine and risk your lives.

Although you can't be a real helicopter pilot, this game offers the experience at a low cost and surprisingly low requirement, which my old Nvdia GT540M could run, albiet lower graphics.

review:
Not bad, this is my new go to game for blowing off steam. The helicopter physics are fun on pilot mode I don't bother with any easy settings. I think arma 3 is better but it's also much more expensive (including all arma 3's dlcs).
I was actually moving around in my seat trying to look around, it's pretty immersive when you get into it. 
I just wish the buildings were more destructable, seems kind of dumb when you launch 10-15 rockets but they all blow up on some random peice of concrete but the concrete remains perfect.
Anyway it's fun in short bursts, not really worth it full price for me but I got it on sale and I'm happy with my purchase.

review:
The game is fun. It's also nearly impossible to beat.
You have to do the campaign EXACTLY right to succeed or you fail and have to start over at the last checkpoint, which is usually pretty far away.
Other than that, it's a great game. I play with medium settings on my laptop and get about 30 fps, most computers could get 60 on medium. High settings are actually really nice but lags pretty bad unless you have a really good pc. The controls are a little confusing at first but once you get used to them it's not so bad.

Also the Mi-8 model is wrong, it have the weapons system of the Mi-8AMTSh\Mi-171Sh, but the 3D model and cockpit are of the Mi-8MTV. (Other problem is that both, Mi-8AMTsh and Mi-28N, use wrong type of missiles, as they mount Vikhr's intead of Atakas), but if you ignore those details, is a good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970509330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1552813761}
review: Damn, I like this game. Simulation aspects are here definetly, but its more arcade for sure. That however, does not take away my enjoyment of this game at all. The missions that ship with the game are short and sweet, but a blast to fly. The four helicopters represented here (If you purchased the DLC) are the MI-24 Hind, MI-28 Havoc, MI-8 Hip and KA-50 Hokum. They fly mostly the same with just the look of them different. You can fly in different enviroments and the missions are fictionally based in scattered locations around the eastern hemisphere. The music is blood pumpingly good and gets you in the mood to blow shit up. Not a triple A title for sure, but some fun to be had here. Comes with Workshop support which is a good bonus. 8/10 for a really decent title.

review:
あまり有名なゲームではないようですが、よくできたゲームだと思います。
HINDをあやつり、さまざまなミッションをクリアしていくアクションゲームですが、
武器の選択、ターゲットの優先度の見極めなど、戦略性があり、たんにボタンを押しまくっていればなんとかなるゲームとは一線を画します。

本格的なフライトシミュレーターのような複雑な操作性はいらず、おじさんが週末に現実逃避するにはもってこいです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198034118715', 'num_games_owned': 4134, 'num_reviews': 508, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1541227516}
review:
ハインドが一機あれば対地攻撃から兵員輸送に固定翼機の撃墜までなんだってできるぞっていう、設計当時の夢を実現するようなカジュアルフライトシューティング。まあ実際には十徳ナイフよりも何の変哲もないナイフの方が使いやすいわけだが。

それはともかく、操縦できるのは終始ハインドのみにも関わらず、ハインドの多機能っぷりを見せつけるかのように仕事の幅も広く、一応とは言え日本語もあり、武装も選べてわりあいよくできてはいる。

けど致命的な欠点として、HUDの類が大変ポンコツである。

まず目標マーカーがわかりにくい。常に表示が変わらないせいで、例えば目の前のビルにマーカーがついていたとして、そのビルが目標なのか、それともビルの影にあるなにかが目標なのかわからない。一つのビルの表と裏に何箇所かロケットを撃ち込んで倒壊させろなんて言われると大変ややこしい。

またこいつ計器飛行ができない。例えば前進するために前傾になっている場合、照準は当然機首の延長上、斜め下の地面を指向しているわけだが、同じ位置に水平儀や昇降計も表示されてしまう。パイロットが頭を上げて水平に前方を見ている場合、当然斜め下の地面は視界の外だ。機体の傾きも高度もわからない。その上で、発見されないように高度を60m以下に保てとか、そりゃねえよ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198067142523', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1388, 'last_played': 1607746672}
review:
Ou comment en chiiier comme un russe en devenant pilote du mythique hélicoptère : le HIND.
Retrouver le test écrit sur :  http://lesgrosjeuxdupc.fr/air-missions-hind/
Pour le test vidéo, c'est par là : https://youtu.be/qx8z23tnR8E
Résumé:
++ Piloter le "tank volant", on ne fait pas ça tous les jours.
++ Graphiquement assez réussi et détaillé pour en profiter.
++ 5 environnements différents (Asie du Sud Est, Europe Orientale, Artique...) avec des aires de combat étendues.
++ Ambiance sonore et musiques au top.
++ 60 images/s et aucun problème de fluidité.
+   15 missions diversifiées + 10 missions supplémentaires gratuites sur le Workshop.
+   Le mode Action Directe (un speed run avec classement mondial).
+   17 euros, c'est pas cher pour la qualité du titre.

-   Un seul hélico dispo et les 3 autres en DLC payants (3 Euros la bête).
-   Une sensation de vitesse parfois mal rendue.
-   Difficulté parfois mal équilibrée (en dent de scie).
--  Les dégats n'ont aucune incidence sur le pilotage.
--  Le mode multijoueur en ligne qui aurait pu être une réussite s'il n'était pas désert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198989989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1593618817}
review:
ZZ的难度设计，ZZ的判定，气到我了
  本来想给好评的，虽说直升机操作手感完全谈不到模拟器的级别，但游戏性还可以，画面也可以接受，没遇到闪退和进不去什么的。
  但是，但是，但是！玩这个游戏的战役做好被气炸的准备，ZZ的难度设计完全没有梯度可言，给一个直升机各种奇奇怪怪的任务，队友AI不管是地面单位还是直升机都蠢爆了，不要指望他们能帮你什么哪怕是最简单的挡枪子！而你TM还要保护他们不被敌人射爆！某个让你救队友的关卡会限定时间让你一架直升机消灭四面八方分散的诸多敌人，而且我发现时间越少他减得时间越快，最后让你背板数次你的十几个队友还是会被三两个残敌接近然后显示任务失败，FK！ 最后还要去打掠食者无人机！
  另外不推荐买DLC，那几个直升机的DLC都是换皮不换里，除了模型不一样没啥不同，还少一个挂载点。

review: This is a bad arcade helicopter game. The graphics are bad, the missions are mediocre, the game tanks the computer's framerate in everything after it's closed. One thing to note is that towards the single player campaign there is a mission where you are tasked with taking on 4 choppers head on. This mission is impossible to do because they lock onto you with missiles and your flares don't work half the time. Not to mention that they absolutely pummel you with those missiles so you will run out of flares very quickly. Overall a garbage game with idiotic mission design.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006784126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 400, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1534885244}
review:
Air Missions: HIND 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1487144957

[b]POSITIVES[/b]

+ 15 immer anspruchsvoller werdende Missionen plus 3 Trainingsmissionen
+ drei unterschiedliche Steuerungsmodi (Casual, Anfänger und Pilot), wobei sich bei ersterem der Heli auch immer langsam Richtung Fadenkreuz ausrichtet
+ im Gegensatz zu vielen anderen Action-Simulatoren inklusive Starten und Landen in einigen Missionen, darunter einmal sogar auf einem Hochhaus, zwischen Bäumen im Dschungel, auf einem sich bewegenden Flugzeugträger was gar nicht so einfach ist und auf einer Öl-Plattform
+ wahlweise verschiedene Außenansichten oder Cockpitansicht
+ begrenzte Munition mit begrenzter Nachlademöglichkeit was das ganze etwas realistischer macht, da man seine Waffen überlegt einsetzen muss
+ nützliche IR-Sicht die es ermöglicht feindliche Kräfte im Unterholz zu erkennen
+ Autohover-Funktion
+ verschiedene Waffensysteme zum Freischalten darunter UPK 23 Maschinengewehre, GUV Gunpods, FAB Bomben und eine Vielzahl von Raketen mit denen man nach und nach lernt umzugehen
+ Leuchtkörperabwurf gegen feindliche Boden-Luft-Raketen
+ Einsatz des Seiten-MGs bei einigen Einsätzen gegen Infanterie inklusive Perspektivewechsel
+ Rettungseinsätze inklusive Suche nach rotem Rauch im tiefsten Dschungel und einem U-Boot das nicht mehr abtauchen kann
+ vier unterschiedliche Schauplätze: Zentralasien (Steppe, Hügel, kleine Ortschaften), Osteuropa (Wälder, Städte), Südostasien (Dschungel, Reisfelder) und arktische Ozean
+ 6 unterschiedliche Tarnungen für den Heli
+ Missions-Editor (siehe im Workshop)

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1488005862

[b]NEGATIVES[/b]

- grafisch bestenfalls mittelmäßig
- Feueranimationen sehen von nahem nicht so doll aus
- Gräser und hohe Sträucher wiegen in einem etwas unnatürlichem Rhythmus hin und her was negativ auffällt
- HUD ist nicht sonderlich hübsch
- Schnee wird nicht durch die Rotoren aufgewirbelt, sondern fällt einfach durch
- beim Umschauen im Cockpit sitzt da niemand am Steuer
- nur ein einziger Helikopter, der MI-24 HIND, im Grundspiel steuerbar(!); den HAVOC, HIP und HOKUM gibt es nur in den jeweiligen DLCs
- Sprachausgabe nur in Russisch bzw. Englisch mit russischem Akzent (lediglich deutsche Untertitel)
- Kampagne eher nüchtern präsentiert und inszeniert ohne irgendwelche Storyelemente dazwischen
- kaum spannende Wendungen in den Missionen bei denen es sich zudem nur um fiktive Konflikte handelt ohne geschichtlichen Bezug
- dem Gunner (der HIND ist eigentlich ein Zweisitzer) können keine Ziele zugewiesen werden, die dieser selbstständig bekämpft
- Multiplayer ist tot und damit unnötig

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1488192493

[b]FAZIT[/b]

Air Missions: HIND von Anfang 2016 ist mehr Action-Arcade als Simulation, was aber völlig okay ist. Zunächst war ich von der Grafik eher etwas enttäuscht. Da man auch mal helikopterbedingt tiefer und langsamer fliegt, sieht man die Gegneranimationen und den Bodenbewuchs deutlicher als bei anderen Arcade-Flugsimulationen, und dabei fallen diese leider negativ auf. 
Das Missionsdesign ist nicht wirklich herausragend und allgemein macht das Spiel einen leicht lieblosen Eindruck. Es wirkt alles ohne großen Aufwand mit einem Editor zusammengebaut. 
Dennoch, und nun kommt das Wichtigste, machte mir das Rumfliegen und Kämpfen mit dem HIND einfach Spaß und hat mich bis zur letzten Mission 7 Stunden lang motiviert. Zudem gibt es speziell im Helikopter-Genre ja aber auch nur recht wenig Auswahl. 
Es ist zwar schade dass man ohne DLCs nur einen einzigen Heli fliegen kann, trotzdem vergeben ich einen Daumen nach oben.

Wenn ihr an weiteren Reviews von mir interessiert seid, dann folgt meiner [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/10868887-Dark-Chummer%27s-Reviews/?appid=63110]Gruppe[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198021422660', 'num_games_owned': 3620, 'num_reviews': 1228, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1533715047}
review:
Очень любопытная аркада на вертолётную тематику притом с отечественными вертолётами полностью на русском языке. Даже голос на русском. Рекомендовать можно - управление и графика отторжения не вызывают. К тому же есть облачное сохранение и прогресс не потеряется при переходе на другое устройство. Вот только карточек нет...

Сам же пока делаю возврат из-за отсутствия мощного компа под эту игру. На моём ноуте еле выдаёт 17 кадров. А с такой частотой играть невозможно. Тем не менее удалось пройти тренировку. Жаль, что тормозит... придётся проходить Ace Combat... Притом багов на минимальных настройках не заметил - взлетел, пострелял, посадил и всё норм. Оптимизацию и карточки бы... Но это мелочи. Может у кого комп мощнее - берите, полетайте на российской технике.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990802081', 'num_games_owned': 360, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1530483151}
review:
Мне, как не особо любителя реальных симуляторов самолетов, да и в обще авиации, понравилась. И не потому что ключ получил от разработчика, а потому что действительно сделано классно в жанре аркады.
Вот как Аркада она цепляет. Сначала поиграл, чтобы записать обзор https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6tqEqHLFt7M
А потом просто полетал.
Я больше любитель стратегий, а точнее градо-транспортно-экономических стратегий(Вооо как завернул:) ), но иногда хочется отвлечься, расслабить так сказать мозг, и поиграть во что-нибудь более адреналиново.

Так что если вы не асс в авиа симуляторах и не хотите долго заморачиваться запоминая 100 клавиш, что бы только взлететь, то данная игра не будет разочарованием потраченных денег.

author: {'steamid': '76561198395187673', 'num_games_owned': 114, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1536039466}
review:
首先，这是一款非常好玩的直升机模拟类游戏。
操作上，对于直升机操作和武器操作的模拟十分舒服，既有一点操作难度，又使玩家很快就能上手，我觉得可以说是非硬核模拟游戏的典范了。
但是部分关卡设计不是那么让人舒服，感觉难度有些偏高，容错率很低，而且会感觉手忙脚乱，需要同时操作直升机与导弹，有些困难。
游戏画面确实跟不上时代了，但考虑游戏大小，已经十分让人满意了，如果亮度能调小一点就很舒服了。
总体来说游戏质量十分优秀，但是如果原价55元入游戏有些偏贵了，建议等打折再入。

author: {'steamid': '76561198259354004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1529869425}
review:
It's a cool little game, which waskinda fun in the first 20 minutes, but that's where the positives end.

   The game looks and feels as though it was released in 2000, not 2016. Graphics are chunky, maps are small and look worse than some games released pre-2000
   Controls are impossible: you either use the mouse or the keyboard, using both together in a harmonious fashion as you would in, for example, ArmA flight models, is simply impossible. Wanna aim somewhere without turning the whole helicopter? Nope. Wanna turn the heli whilst aiming the turret at something else? Nope.
   Hitboxes are broken as all hell. You can fly through some buildings, through helicopters, through trees, but landing gently is the most destructive thing since Hiroshima, go figure.
   The missions are ridiculous. Fly there, destroy that, done. Each last ~5-8 mins, except those that last over 30 because landing where the game tells you to kills you. Or because killing all of the enemies on an oil platform with a .50 cal will, surprisingly, damage the oil tanks
  Multiplayer servers aren't a thing. I mean, they might be, I just haven't seen a single one online.

[EDIT]
  I was gonna try and play the game again, and look at it through a ''it's an indie game'' POV, but even that was impossible when the game crashed 5 times on launch, and failed to launch 2 more times after verifying game files. 

You'd be better off buying ArmA 3 and flying CUP mod Hinds. They're just so much better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194612621', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1813, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 658, 'last_played': 1684818659}
review:
Неплохая игра в некогда популярном жанре вертолетных аркад. По атмосфере и геймплею навевает воспоминания о старой доброй серии Desert- Jungle- etc...- Strike. По скидке за 150 рублей самое оно. :) 

ПЛЮСЫ:
-Неплохой геймплей. Приятная физика. Разнообразное вооружение, комбинируемое в разных сочетаниях под задачи.
-Разнообразные миссии от "взорви этот мост" до "найди затаившихся стелс-бронетанковых пихотов с помощью ИК-камеры" и "останови атаку танкового полка 4-мя ПТУРами." На высокой сложности иногда приходится даже немножко думать, подбирая под миссию вооружение и продумывая свои действия в кульминационные моменты.
-Симпатичная картинка. Не вершина технического прогресса, но смотрится норм.

МИНУСЫ:
-Нулевой онлайн.
-Оптимизация прихрамывает.
-Нет сюжета. Да и фиг с ним. :)
-Геймплею, при всех его плюсах, малость не хватает глубины. Техника врагов разных периодов времени, (от Афганской войны до Чеченских кампаний, на которые игра как бы намекает), мало чем отличается друг от друга. Как следствие, мало различий в вооружениях вертолета. ПТУРы разных поколений  ничем не отличаются друг от друга, НУРсы выбираются по принципу "бери пачку потолще". В принципе, не критично, ибо играется весело и так, но тем не менее.

В общем, как уже писал выше, по скидке игру взять определенно рекомендую. За полную цену - не уверен.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986499216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1527974597}
review:
El caso, es que me lo temia.....
Menos mal que solo me he gastado 11 €, este es un juego que no debiera valer más de 3€ con DLC´s incluidos.
Hay una máxima en esto de los juegos, comprobada por mi y que es que si los menús de opciones son simplones, con pocas configuraciones, entonces el juego es eso: un jueguito. Y aquí esto se cumple a la perfección.
No he jugado ni un minuto, pero es que se me ha quitado las ganas viendo solo el menú de opciones, no me he dignado ni a enchufar el joystick.
CONCRETANDO:
En el juego no se puede configurar la resolución, esto solo se puede hacer desde el menú que se despliga sobre el icono del juego donde aparece una opción de configuración a parte, en el juego apenas hay 7 u 8 aspectos a configurar lo cual dice muy poco en favor de este. Este título no parece moderno, más bien recuerda a los juegos  de hace 20  años.
Los graficos exteriores son como mucho aceptables , sin embargo los interiores de las cabinas son poco nenos que horribles, yo pensé (iluso de mi) que al menos llegarín a la calidad de los cockpits de War Thunder, pero ni de coña. Son cutres y descuidados y solo  se "parecen" a los de los aparatos reales, con indicadores que no funcionan y algunos no tienen ni agujas.
Con estos detalles, se me quitan las ganas empezar ninguna misión. 

Es un ARCADE , optimizado para jugar desde vistas exteriores, que se maneja con no más de 5 o 6 teclas (armamento incluido). Con un HUD arcade. Un "mata mata" de helis que ni siquiera tiene gráficos brillantes y con interiores para pasar el trámite.

Si venís del mundo de la simulación como el DCS o el IL2 1946 o el IL2 BoS, IL2 CoD .... No caigais en la trampa , esto no se parece en nada al Comanche vs Hokum / Apache vs Havok. Como en algunos comentarios pretenden vendernos y tampoco es un War Thunder de Helis. No encontrareis detalles ni realismo aquí. Y eso queno he volado ningún Heli, de esta manera, no me meteré con las físicas.

Debería de poderse devolver el dinero en estos casos, creo que los consumidores estamos muy desprotegidos frente a este tipo de productos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058703541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 793, 'last_played': 1553781150}
review:
A very fun helicopter game. That's right: its a game, not a simulator.

When I say "this game had so much more potential", don't mistake that to mean that this game isn't fun. It is a very good time, and will often challenge you (on higher difficultly, and more realistic settings). There is a good variety of missions, 4 different Russian helos to choose from (no Ka-52 though), the loadout and helo capabilities are mostly realistic (as far as I can tell), and the game even looks nice! Another HUGE plus is that this game has 3 flight control settings, which means total flight noobs and flight sim veterans will have fun here.

My biggest complaint is how much this game rides the fence between being a game and being a simulator. I mean, you'll play one mission in which you'll hunt elusive tanks through the forests of the Caucasus, guiding in MCLOS or SACLOS missiles using your TrackIR gear and think, "Wow this is so incredibly cool. It must the a dream job being an attack helo pilot!" . . . . And then the next mission you'll be pretending that the Russians welded a stolen American Browning M2 to the side of a Mi-24 and proceed to shoot terribly animated soldiers on the ground in what looks like was ripped straight out of a mobile game (frankly, those missions are disgusting blemishes on this game)

My next complaint is the developer's terrible job of creating immersion and realism of the environment. The campaign is clunkly and incoherent, but that's no problem for me, I came here to blow stuff up not play an RPG. But, what does bother me is that you don't really feel like a Russian helo pilot. I'll never forget the first moment when I was disappointed in the game: when I first looked closely at friendly "Russsian" soldiers and the ground, and saw them using US gear (i.e. wearing MARPAT uniforms, carrying M-4 rifles). Again, I beat on the "door gunner" missions . . . a Browning M2 on a Hind? WHAT THE HELL?! In addition, the game tries much to hard to be cinematic with combat, where 2 pound explosive rockets make explosions the size of 500Lb Mk 82 bombs. A small complaint, but, it still kills the immersion.

In addition The overall visual design and feel of the game comes off as a mobile game app, or a kids game. There's just something about every game, something about how models are designed, lighting and colors, and content that makes a game serious or not. I wished for a more serious combat game.

With all of that said, I enjoyed this game very much, and it allowed me to scratch that itch for blowing stuff up using Russian attack helos. When I figured out that I can look around the cockpit and control the IR view with my TrackIR headset, I started enjoying the game even more, as it helped with realism quite a bit.

Overview:

Pros
+ Accessible for both casual players and simulation buffs with 3 different flight control settings
+ Semi-realistic helicopter and weapons capabilities
+ Good variety in helicopter loadouts
+ Most missions are fun and have a decent variety
+ Hind cockpit view is really cool (Use TrackIR!)
+ Graphics are good, if a little bit cinematic
+ Track IR support
+ 4 Russian helos to fly

Cons
- Terrible job with quality control and immersion all around
- Friendly "Russian" forces are just US look-alike models ripped out of a $1 mobile game app
- Campaign and story are soooooo clunky and incoherent
- Inconsistent difficulty. Most missions take 1 try, but a couple take closer to 30 or 40 . . . . seriously
- DLC cockpits are very lazily put together; little/missing detail
- Overall design feels immature; lacking a serious combat game feel
- DOOR GUNNER MISSIONS ARE F#@KING DUMPSTER FIRES!!! . . . unsat

review:

リアルすぎずカジュアルすぎずな操作性で慣れれば非常に快適に動かせる点は一番の評価ポイント。
そして自分にとってはコレが満たされた時点で十分以上な作品。
イメージとしてはGAのガングリフォンを思い出した

○悪い点
・当たり判定
装甲車、ヘリ等は不満はないが歩兵が非常に狙いづらい、ハインドの機首武装は12.7mmのため直撃しないといけないとは思うが
途中のミッションで雲霞の如く迫る敵歩兵をなぎ倒すステージでは地獄が見れる
・一部敵の耐久
敵トラックが装甲モリモリなのか下手するとIFVより硬い


○評価が分かれそうな点
・X軸の操作感
他のゲームに比べると独特で上記にあるBFシリーズのテクニックにある”機首をターゲットに向けたままの旋回”というのは非常にやりづらい。
ただ自分の場合は自分は攻撃ヘリがそのような機動をして敵を攻撃している映像を見たことがないのでさほど気にならなかった。

・ミサイルの操作性
年代的にアクティブホーミングのヘリ用対地ミサイルはほとんどなかったという点を反映してか手動誘導が必要。
これが難しく照準もかなり重くしかも滑るため慣れが必須
セミアクティブのものに変わっても誘導モードに入らなくていいと言うだけで通常状態で敵に照準を合わせ続ける必要あり

○総評
ヘリコプター版エースコンバット
BFシリーズのヘリ操作でシングル特化のゲームを探していた自分にとっては”コレだ！”と言えた作品。自分としては価格に対するボリュームは十分満足行くものだった。

author: {'steamid': '76561197992636376', 'num_games_owned': 561, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1522631685}
review:
Don't get me wrong, this game is actually quite good in its core and a nice treat for people who are into Russian combat helicopters.

The controls take some getting used to at first, but they are perfectly fine. Such is the graphics engine with the detailed helicopter models and even the mandatory cockpit camera view. There's even a mission editor and multiplayer.

What [b]Air Missions: HIND[/b] fails is to deliver though is a decent campaign and mission design. Some of the missions like the sinking of oil tankers in the Arctic Ocean are okay at best, but most of the time they are pretty incoherent from each other and follow no real story or consistency. Often they are also way too short and easy, so it's easily possible that you've been through the whole game in just one evening.

A little bit more of effort put into the campaign would have done miracles to this game, and the above mentioned positive points don't really justify paying 10 to 15 Dollars for this. At this point I rather say 3 to 5 USD would be OK, so better buy this game during sales, if anything.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984234166', 'num_games_owned': 457, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1553871806}
review:
This game is a refreshing title but it needs a few caveats explained.

First of all, this is a mouse controlled  aircraft, think warthunder if it had helicopters. Really, this is what Ace Combat would be if it had gone with helicopters. You have the ability to reload in the air, missions are based around blowing lots of stuff up with slow moving rockets, and only superficially is the game realistic. The interior of the helicopters are very pretty, but you will be spending most of your time in third person.

Graphics are excellent and what we have here is a nice arcade air shooter that visually looks great, as well as has some great gameplay under it. This game is in my opinion highly worth it while on sale. 

The DLC only adds different helicopters, other than that it provides no extra content.

review: This game has its share of negatives.  The maps are pretty small.  The missions are simple and uninspired. There are a fair number of weapons to choose from, but they all sort of seem like they are the same weapon.  I could probably keep going on, but none of that stuff really matters with this game.  The important thing is that its really fun to fly around a shoot things.  Everything else is really just there so you have an excuse to fly around and shoot things.  If your looking for realism, you wont find it here, but if you want some fun arcade gunship action, this game nails it.  I don’t have to words to describe whats so right about this game other than to just say the gameplay feels really right.  When all is said and done, My only REAL complaint I have is the lack of replayability.  There are some high score missions that really help out, but I would have loved some infinite wave based missions or something to keep me playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964070943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1020, 'last_played': 1536043388}
review:
This is an awesome combat flight sim.

The missions are fun yet challenging.  

If I could give it a score I would give it 4 out of 5 stars.

Pros:

- Missions are fun and they keep getting better.

- Can't complain about the graphics for the price. It is apealing to the eye.

- A good amount of weapons.

- Blowing things up is fun.

Cons: (Subjective mostly)

- Wish you could buy or go back to base for ammo rather than having only a limited amount of reloads.

- I wish you could add more weapons to your helicopter. It feels like you never have enough rockets and so you have to 
   drop the machine guns all together for more rockets.

- The helicopters feel slow. They should really speed it up.

- I wish there were more HELICOPTERS! 

- I wish there was more of a story mode.

- I wish you could pick pilots (name pilots) - pilots get rewards - pick co-pilot - machine gunner - drop team and back 
   them up. 

- I wish you can buy more things for your helicopter (with points) like better radar system - heat seaking system, Etc.

I can't wait for AIR Missions: 2

author: {'steamid': '76561198030978763', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1511954448}
review:
Tried this game, then returned it for a refund. It's definitely a *game*, and a very arcady game at that. Definitely nothing like the good old "approachable" helo sims of the past such as Ka-52 Alligator and Enemy Engaged: Comanche vs Hokum. 

The flight model is one thing. I've never flown a real helicopter so I can't really comment anything definitive, but on the most realistic "pilot" flight model setting and the joystic sensitivity at maximum I don't think it's too bad. Probably still a bit more stable and forgiving than what a real helicopter would be.

The bigger problem lies elsewhere. While the older sims were about trying to create at least semi-realistic scenarios, this game is simply all about blasting away tons of enemies with unlimited weapons in scenarios that have nothing to do with realism. If the mission is about "taking out enemy artillery positions", in practice it means that you'll take off (simply by applying full throttle), fly for something like 800 meters and engage the literally 30 guns that are scattered all around in the terrain. If you run out of ammunition, no problem. Just push a button and all your weapons are magically reloaded. There's no damage modelling, both you and the enemies just have a simple health bar (which you can hide if you want but technically it's still there). There's no avionics or targeting systems or anything on the helicopter, all the enemies are simply highlighted on the screen with red triangles. Over all it's clearly just a very simple shooter game that just happens to involve a helicopter. If you're looking for a helicopter sim with ANY degree of immersion, stay away from this one.

review:
Arkáda, kde ovládáš HIND a střílíš po nepřátelík. Nic moc s mozkem, navíc pro mě, jakožto obyvatele "východní Evropy" celkem chladivej zážitek když si uvědomím, že je to hraný z pohledu Rusáků a ta anonymní východoevropská země klidně může bejt Čechie, nebo Slovensko. 

Takže na jednu stranu bleju (strachy). Na druhou stranu, jedná se o kvalitně zpracovanou arkádu, tak proč si nezablbnout. :) 

Osobně bych uvítal, kdybych musel POKAŽDÝ vzlítnout a přistát, ukončování misí "ve vzduchu" mi přijde ještě dětinštější než je nezbytně nutný, ale asi už jsem moc náročnej... :D 

Cajk hra, arkáda, proč ne. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198183622617', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 2314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1247, 'last_played': 1543180654}
review:
Ενα από τα πολύ καλά παιχνίδια με προσομοιωτή πτήσης ελικοπτέρου αλλά και δράση συνδυάζονται άψογα στις αποστολές του Air missions Hind. 
Στα θετικά θα έβαζα τα ωραία γραφικά και την υποστήριξη που έχει απο την κοινότητα. 
Στα αρνητικά θα μπορούσε να έχει περισσότερες αποστολές και καλύτερο στόρυ και επίσης ο editor θα έπρεπε να βελτιωθεί προσθέτοντας περισσότερα μοντέλα οχημάτων καθώς και μοντέλα κτιρίων. Επίσης επιλογή για δημιουργία random terrain και συνθήκες καιρού. 

Κατά τα άλλα είναι ενα εξαιρετικό παιχνίδι με πολλές προοπτικές στο μέλλον. Τέτοιου είδους παιχνίδια με ελικόπτερα περιμέναμε να βγουν από το 2013.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063161757', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1691685617}

Pleasantly surprised - an excellent sim! Reminds me of the good old Novalogic stuff - perfect balance between realism and pure arcade fun. Best of both worlds :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198026269322', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1509285921}
review: При всем возможном уважении к советскому авиастроению, управление с геймпада - полное дерьмище. Logitech'увский геймпад игра распознает как джойстик, кнопки назначены хрен знает как, в меню вместо привычных "A" на подтверждение и "B" на отмену кнопки сдвинуты куда то вправо, (X - подтверждение и A - отмена соответственно), в тренировочной миссии те ниче толком не объясняют, в том числе и как наводить на цель ракеты. В конечном счете отработал по тренировочным целям как нурсами, добил остатки с пулемета. Игре совершенно пофиг, типа "всё", такая, "лети на базу". Проверю еще пару миссий, если они сделаны по качеству так же - мне плевать что это дело на распродаже и просят за неё 300р, запрошу возврат. Если что то делать, то делать это ответственно, в том числе видеоигры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088280758', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 572, 'last_played': 1626625798}
review:
优点：任务内容比较写实，没有过多的夸张内容；直升机飞行和攻击效果比较令人满意；俄语配音好评，音乐也比较带感。
缺点：除直升机外其他单位和场景建模非常糟糕，尤其士兵和拿着枪的猴子差不多；在游戏内容较单一的情况下还不能使用真实的武器伤害模拟而采用血条显得有些诚意不足；部分关卡胜利与失败条件不合理（比如某任务要求不让敌军接近友军，结果敌军被打得只剩一个人接近了我方几十人的部队，任务宣告失败......提示我军几十人被敌方一人攻击，遭受重大损失；又比如某任务要求摧毁敌人尚未起飞的直升机，但距离很远的时候对方就开始起飞了，很难及时全部摧毁，敌方有一架升空就直接任务失败......)

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198004074983', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1495655464}
review:
Evet, 26 TL'ye alınabilecek en iyi oyun değil belki ama zevkli bir oyun. Arcade tarzı bir oyun yani simulasyon oyuncuları sevmeyebilir. Açıkcası bende arcade türü uçak oyunlarından hoşlanan birisi değilim fakat bu oyundan zevk aldım. Görevlerde minigun koltuğuna oturma olayı da güzel olmuş. Sadece helikopter kullanmıyor, minigun koltuğuna da oturabiliyoruz kimi zaman.
Fakat oyundaki müzik seçimleri ve ses efektleri gerçekten çok kötü. Ayrıca bölümler de çok kolay. Açık dünyadaki bölümler de inanılmaz kısa sürüyor. Buda oyundan alınan zevki ve oyun süresini düşürüyor. Bu oyunu alacaksanız iyi düşünün, birkaç saat zevk alıp birdaha hiç açmayacağınız bir oyun olabilir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034480430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1507028129}
review: Отличная игра. Стоит, более детально, проработать одиночную кампанию. Война в Афганистане, прекрасно подошла бы, в качестве основной темы. Можно взять за образец, игру "Hind" 1996 года ( брифинги, миссии, задачи - все на высоте ). Побольше разнообразия: сопровождение армейских колонн, непосредственная авиа поддержка наступающих войск, заброска и эвакуация спецназа, авиа штурмовка горных огневых точек душманов. Есть замечательный потенциал, создать "Ил 2", на вертолетную тематику.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056441021', 'num_games_owned': 287, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 568, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1511026010}
review:
This game is not a bad game but has some things I don't like about it.

The Controlls are good and easy. I recommend a Joystick but even with mouse and keyboard it is playable.

Weapons feel good, but guided missiles are a pain to use. You unlock better guided missiles later and you can customize the weapons controll to your liking. You can use mouse and joystick at the same time, means you can controll the helicopter with the joystick and the weapons with the mouse.

There are subtle differences in the handling and feeling of the helicotpers. The engine sounds could be a bit more prominent. A bit more bass in the engine sounds would sound more intimidating. 

Graphics are nice although they are very bright. I would like to have a gamma option.

I also recommend you to turn off three collision damage. Because in some missions, you have to land and small bushes that would be no problem for the helo kill it. I nudged into a little bush, My helo exploded. That is ridicolous.

A option to create your own paintjobs would be nice, or more skins in general.

There is a mission editor and even though I have not tried it, there are a number of user made missions avaiable.

I would recommend it on a sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217350348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1571748928}
review:
In my opinion an excellent Helicopter War shoot 'em'up. Right up my street! Just took a chance and bought through Steam sale and absolutely loving it. Never even heard of this game before. Im using my Saitek X52 Pro. Works really well. I was able to configure the joystick and thruster unit buttons perfectly. It took a little time, what i had. 
I find the helicopters really nice to fly and control. After a short while i was able to fly and shoot at the same time. I would definately recommend this game to any flight fans or war fans. For the money i spent i am happy with the nice scenery,  overall graphics, good gun fire and explosions. I also bought the 3 extra choppers which were DLC and part of the deluxe edition package. All in all it cost £11.00 for everything. I have not witnessed any bugs or glitches so far so all good!  
I dont care if its arcadey or simulation, i just really enjoy it and i hope you do too. 🚁

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198091759786', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1611598746}
review:
Air Missions : Hind est une petite perle dans un genre en déshérence, à savoir la simulation d'hélicoptères. Techniquement très bien réalisé, le jeu est en plus extrêmement complet au niveau de son contenu. En effet, les différentes machines russes proposées (Mi-17/24/28 et Ka-50) sont fidèlement représentées et dispose de leur panoplie complètement d'armements.

Qui plus est, le jeu offre un grand nombre de terrains d'opérations (Asie centrale, du Sud-Est, Europe de l'Est, Moyen-Orient et Arctique) et de nombreuses missions avec, en plus, un éditeur de missions particulièrement bien réalisé.

Un travail magnifique.

review:
5/10 建议观望

+场景破坏，楼房都会随着打击出现损伤，最终倒塌

独立制作的直升机小游戏。没有什么剧情，全是一关一关的小任务，可以使用mi-24，ka-50，mi-28和mi-17，各种载弹可以更换。飞机操作感觉偏娱乐，画面一般般。一些关卡设计不是很合理，尤其是最后一关，mi-24打掠夺者无人机，完全是被虐。整体感觉一般。

author: {'steamid': '76561197986675316', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1222, 'last_played': 1508374847}
review:
This review is for Xbox controller players only. That's how I played the game. As background I loved Apache 2, Comanche, etc. some 15 years ago and had a HOTAS and rudder pedal setup back then, but no more.

TLDR this is a 7 out of 10 recommend (buy on sale) for Xbox controller gamers looking for a bit of approachable helicopter "sim-lite" nostalgia but be ready to walk away or be frustrated.

I really had high hopes for this sim. Finally an approachable helicopter combat game that can be played with an Xbox controller! 

Sadly the Xbox controls don't feel good to me. Anything beside Pilot mode doesn't feel remotely helicopter-ish. In Pilot mode I've tried multiple different setups, but nothing clicks. There's too much going on and it feels like you are fighting the controls the whole time rather than feeling like the game experience was optimized for the controller. I got stuck on the Jungle Air Support mission near the end of the campaign where you have to do lots and lots of manual shooting because the auto-gunner is too slow and aims at friendly troops. Ultimately I've had some fun with the game, but not finishing sucks.

Close air support of friendly troops in particular is NOT fun. The Jungle Air Support mission is just torture. 
-- The auto-gunner targets FRIENDLY troops (WHY???) and there is nothing mapped on the controller to switch targets.
-- Manual aiming is frustrating, particularly while zoomed -- the camera needs to pan to follow the manual aiming box when it hits the edge of the screen when TrackIR isn't in use. You do get this behavior in autohover & gunner camera view, but that's not always viable. The sensitivity needs to be turned way down to hit anything. Perhaps map the left stick Y-access to vertical camera pan when in autohover/manual aim?  Manually panning with the D-pad is a poor solution -- you need your hands on the sticks. Why can't tapping B switch weapons and holding B reload weapons? That frees up a shoulder button to act as a "shift or toggle key" that could remap the sticks and face buttons when held (or toggled), allowing "pilot mode" and "gunner mode" that adds more targeting functions that currently are keyboard-only and "freelook". Manual gunning outside of autohover is clearly what is intended but I have been unable to achieve the control necessary to beat Jungle Air Support mission despite many, many attempts even with all the damage settings turned off and on easier difficulty.

Most of the reviews for the Xbox One version really trash it - and I can't argue with their objections. I bought it on PC pre-release and had lower expectations for polish; but I was looking a sim-lite that I could play and have fun with a controller and it comes close but ultimately frustrates. I imagine the PC HOTAS or keyboard/mouse crowd may have less to complain about.

review:
Eh. It's okay. Far from a good game, but I bet you didn't expect a good game when you clicked this one anyway, did you?
Air Missions: HIND is an alright game, and it benefits from the current lack of any actual good helicopter-combat games that aren't crazy sims like the DCS-series. It's main competitor is stuff like Thunder Wolves, and it's... On par with Thunder Wolves, I suppose. Beats Heliborne, in any case.

So uh, buy if you want a dumb, sort-of-fun, kind-of-okay helicopter game. Don't buy if you want a good sim, or an actually good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011540788', 'num_games_owned': 435, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1497759300}
review:
It's a game what got a flying tank in it.

Track IR and Logitech 3D Pro work well after a little tweaking (takes, say, 15 minutes).  Track IR can be used to aim 23mm cannon, which is sweet.

The flight model is pretty good.  The helicopter really feels like it weighs twelve tonnes.  S-5 rockets are inaccurate, which encourages ripple-fire techniques.  Haven't blown myself up with my own bombs yet, but the mechanic is there.

I've waited a long time for a good MI-24 Hind simulator.  Now to go bait my wolverine trap...

author: {'steamid': '76561198017487317', 'num_games_owned': 556, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1497481485}
review:
The controls just arent working well for me. The Hind is rather agile in real life, in this game it takes a good 15 seconds to turn 180 degrees, which is ridiculous. It also does not fly like a real helicopter at speed. You can't bank it like a real helicopter. 

Devs, please watch some air show footage of the Hind in flight, it's not a lumbering boat like your game portrays it. 

The camera views and turret aiming are rather cumbersome as well. The field of view from the first person turret doesn't aim down, to hit targets with it you need to be in third person.

 I've unfortunately requested a refund for now. I hope the developer makes some changes to improve it, I may repurchase it later depending how the development continues to progress. 

Update: I wrote this review in June 2017, it is now almost December 2017 and the game has not recieved an update. It's pretty safe to assume this is now abandonware and will not get any of the improvements I had hoped for.
