author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1496954558}
review:
Почитав обзоры я понял, что жалуются на неудобное управление и среднюю графику. Ну с управлением сложно, оно не аркадное и сильно отличается. Например на мой взгляд на клавиатуре и мыши играть удобнее, хотя хотелось бы наоборот. Кнопок различных много, поначалу очень путался. По поводу графики, да, это симулятор, но его делали с уклоном на мультиплеер и ждать от него супер пупер графона думаю нереально. В то же время дрожаний и замытий я не заметил, играл на верхних настройках и ничего не лагало и не тормозило. 

https://youtu.be/YwmyVjAVd0c

Кампания состоит из 15 миссий, они в четырех различных локациях, все разнообразно и интересно выполнять. После завершения компании, увы, развернуться не особо где - мультиплеер пока пустой. Но присутствует редактор в котором можно выполнить задания на свой вкус. Так же есть режимы быстрой игры и тренировка.

Отдельно стоит отметить виды от разных камер, они создают впечатление реально полета на сколько это возможно. С некоторых управлять сложнее, с некоторых проще. Игра полностью на русском языке, и не смотря на ранний доступ вполне играбельна. Думаю доделки будут косметические и больших изменений не сделают. Возможно с релизом пополнится мультиплеер для тех кто опирается только на онлайн.

Еще вы можете посмотреть обзоры на другие игры:
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25737869/
Так же подписывайтесь на нашу группу с халявными раздачами:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/freeekeys

author: {'steamid': '76561198255826538', 'num_games_owned': 5403, 'num_reviews': 609, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1496964778}
review: Когда-то в школьные годя я тащился от дезерт, урбан и джангл страйков на сеге. Air Missions: HIND с моей точки зрения очень похожа на те самые игры. author: {'steamid': '76561198043071571', 'num_games_owned': 653, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1669922934}
review:
Bought this Deluxe Edition about a month ago (on offer at 25% discount) and have played through the campaign and a few of the Steam Workshp Missions .......Total Play Time at writing: 13.4 hours

I quite like the game and believe it has potential although certain aspects of the controls requires work still (door gunner feels awkward - mapped to the left joystick on XBox360Controller in reverse axis if memory serves me correct).

I played on the most realistic control setting as am quite used to Flying Sims from Ace Combat through to MS FSX

The campaign could use some more missions I feel, and the extra Choppers I got as Dlc (HOKUM/HIP/HAVOC) are nice but seldom used as the HIND-24 has 3 "Weapon mounting points" on each stub wing where the others have only 2 which limits theWeapon loadouts ( I understand this likely reflects reality and is therefore no fault of the Dev's).

As for Multiplayer I have yet to find a single Server on the several separate occasions upon which I tried ...at times ranging from 12pm GMT (8am est) throught to around 4am GMT (Midnight-est) which covers the peak gamer times in both europe and US eastern Seaboard.....A REAL SHAME!!


Would I recommend to a friend?......Well YES as I need someone to play with!! but there is room for improvement.

So to those at 3Division I say congratulations thus far on Early Access, but dont rest on your laurels (ike some of the Early Access Developers have) ....the Consumers will  demand more  from the Final Release.

review: 如果你玩过战地2，并且喜欢战地2里直升机的手感，那么恭喜你，这款游戏的手感和战地2的几乎一模一样（上手十分容易，对比武装突袭那操蛋的直升机驾驶体验，这款游戏的操作体验简直赞的飞起）。唯一的缺点是任务里的中东绿绿着装和武器装备和现实中苏军一毛一样，而游戏中的苏军为什么穿的这么民主（简直就是美国大兵翻版），这一定是资本主义的阴谋。

author: {'steamid': '76561198121104012', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 814, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 807, 'last_played': 1495127149}
review:
Excellent game, very fun to play.  Controls take a bit getting used to, but helicopters are hard to fly IRL as well so I find that to be okay.

Pros:

- Great graphics and effects
- Fun gameplay. I especially love the rescue missions! More of those, please?
- Excellent controls. Takes a while to get used to, but once you do you'll feel like you're actually flying a helicopter.


Cons:

- Singleplayer campaign is way too short

- You don't have to land to rearm, you can just do it in mid-air. This makes it too 'arcadey' and detracts from the experience.

 I suggest adding a 'realistic' mode where you have to find a helipad (there can be a couple per map), land on it, and wait a few seconds to rearm instead.

- The hitboxes on the missiles and enemies seem to be messed up. Its incredibly hard to hit an enemy (example: tank) with regular missiles. 

- Some optimization issues on certain maps, most noticable on the foggy jungle map & the arctic map.

- Some minor bugs (a few foot soldiers will still be alive even though the mission prompt says you killed everyone)

- Minor annoyances (After an instant action mission, you are taken back to the main menu instead of to the instact action screen.)

Even though there are more cons than pros, I would still recommend as this is an excellent game despite being in Early Access. I look forward to future updates from this developer & will keep an eye out for any future projects they may create. 



Suggestion(s) to further expand on the game experience:

- More opportunities to land at your starting position after you complete a singleplayer mission so the mission feels more 'complete'. Perhaps this can be optional.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046747192', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1626180551}
review:
Works well with a gamepad such as from the xbox 360.

The game is a blast. The controls have different modes from easy to simulation so you can jump right in there, no learning required or set it so that you do have to learn.

The 4 helicopters fly well offer plenty of weaponry and the missions have the variety needed as well. Instant action generating new simple missions and workshop and MP and coop campaign, there's quite a lot in here.

You can set time and weather as well.

Plenty of fun to be had here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072455134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1141, 'last_played': 1656618761}
review:
评分4/10 
不过考虑到作为独立游戏,可以给8/10甚至更高，牛逼
【米24D/V作为第二代直升机，还要苛求发射F&F激光制导导弹的能力？好歹了解一下载具本体，不要给些理由奇怪的奇葩差评】
----------------------------------------------------------------
总体评价：
Novice模式下操作手感类似于皇牌空战突击地平线，Pilot模式下手感偏向于战地2的武直。
远谈不上飞行模拟游戏，说模拟游戏都非常勉强。偏街机战斗向，军舰的防空只有一个射速和威力和机枪差不多的主炮，4艘组成的舰队被一架米24全灭。
游戏内容类似于突击地平线。
游戏内容时间在8-12小时左右。
----------------------------------------------------------------
DLC评价：
如果对几款直升机没有强烈的信仰加值，不建议购买，游戏中性能并没有超过MI-24，制作的也不太用心
相对下推荐MI-28，拥有本应该只装备KA-50的9K121导弹，反坦克能力非常OP，但游戏里还是不如MI-24实用
其次KA-50，机炮射界稀烂，武器种类少而且3个DLC都有9K121，买的理由只剩下帅了
及其不推荐购买MI-8，没有机炮机动一坨，甚至驾驶员都没做出来，实在是不够用心
----------------------------------------------------------------
PRO：
打折时便宜到家了，非常值这个价格
非常少的钱就能买一个画面很有点赞的游戏
非常多的自定义内容：游戏模式、操作模式、武器、涂装，既能拼成MI-24D也能拼成MI-24V。
武器类型功能独特而且大部分都很有用。
载具本体和座舱制作的非常用心精良，侧边的门可以打开，在驾驶座位回头甚至能看到客舱，小风扇好评
【说不定你的表弟你的同学你老爸看到你玩这个会觉得很酷，而且他们也能上手最简单的操作方式。】
作为独立游戏，各种意义上水平都相当高
----------------------------------------------------------------
CON：
音乐难听，种类还少，一个小时之内就会听腻，还是开个网页挑点合适的BGM吧
1.切到桌面时游戏几率性崩溃，2.这游戏没法手动存档，3.配合起来瞬间爆炸
声效差劲，YakB机炮开火的声效怀疑是用的石头去硌搓衣板做的。
战役和行动的关卡设计大部分都非常糟糕而单调，吃屎一样。街机手感的战斗模式，飞行模拟的任务目标。
1.武器需要玩战役来解锁，2.COOP不支持能解锁武器的战役关卡，3.要么吃屎，要么吃鳖
多人游戏不是双人一机而是一人一机，导致所有时候MCLOS导弹的操作手感都差到难以置信
HUD太***难看，你可能会花掉这游戏接近一半的时间去处理和接受那个糟糕到无以复加的辣鸡HUD，JB都气歪了
小细节不用心，苏联兵手持M16，诸如此类还有很多
----------------------------------------------------------------
建议：对爽向空战类比较喜欢的玩家在打折时购买，不建议购买米28以外的DLC，对前苏联武器信仰比较足的玩家优先考虑。

author: {'steamid': '76561197977705598', 'num_games_owned': 1054, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1491599095}
review:
When I was reading reviews of this game claiming that it was a mix of simulation and arcade gameplay it made me excited to play. After playing it however I realized it is mainly an arcadey game with no sense of simulation whatsoever. While I am fine with an arcadey game this game is just bad and I cannot recommend it. I played a few of the missions and I couldn't force myself through it. The sound effects and music are incredibly awful, everytime you kill a soldier on the ground you hear the same repeated scream. (Also, why can I hear the screams of the soldiers when I am inside my helicopter?) Helicopters are easy to fly but the handling of them is really awkward, it is really sad when helicopters in GTA V fly better and more naturally than the helicopters in this game. The only good part of this game are the graphics and they are ok at best. 

TLDR: don't play this game, if you're looking for a game to fly helicopters that is an arcade/simulation experience just play arma 3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021255140', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1505074361}
review:
Symulator zapowiada sie dobrze ale jeszcze brakuje tu klimatu. Tu takim wyznacznikiem na pewno będą tego typu gry z lat 90 jak Gunship 2000. Gdzie kampania połączona jest z karierą pilota.
Można by tu też przemycić pomysły z tego symulatora. 
Każda misja poprzedzona odprawą na której dopiero dowiadujemy się o zadaniu, a nie suche misje wybierane z listy. Każda misja ze startem i po wykonaniu zadania kiedy brakuje już amunicji, wykorzystując uwarunkowania terenowe żeby nie daj boże, nikt nas nie zauważył powrót do bazy. Po powrocie powitanie i oznaczenia, ewentualnie awans.
Próbowałem pograć w 4 w multiplayer i niestety ograniczenia sa poważne. Do 2 lub 3 graczy można grać w kooperacje. To za mało. Multiplayer dobrze by było traktować nie jako dodatek tylko jako opcja w kampanii.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088829328', 'num_games_owned': 2963, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1500922896}
review:
Get used to seeing "Hind.exe has stopped working" if you decide to invest in this game.
Its hard for me to give an objective review for a program that would not run consistently enough for me to see what was going on, it literally would not run for more than a couple of minutes at a time before freezing and crashing to desktop. I gave up trying in the end. No tweaking or compatability settings made any difference.


Edit:-

I decided to take another look at Hind as I have seen many updates in my download queue.
The game does seem to be a lot more stable but my thumbs down is going to remain a thumbs down  for a couple of reasons.

It is very easy to "glitch" through the terrain/map to find yourself flying "underground" or underwater, this has to be a bug.

I liked the level of detail and the actual flying controls are balanced and responsive, however it is near IMPOSSIBLE to aim your guns or weapons, even in the hover mode, the nearest analogy I can give is to imagine trying to aim a gun at something whilst hanging and twirling around by a single rope. The weapons also seem really ineffective. This makes the campaigns a chore to do and is for me, a game breaker.

author: {'steamid': '76561197981153756', 'num_games_owned': 2658, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1540046706}
review:
Игра очень неплохая. Адекватная графика, неплохая музыка, ну и вообще про вертолеты не так много игр.
Но с управлением беда. Нормально управлять можно только с клавиатуры и мыши, как не странно. Я пробовал Steam Controller и джойстик Logitech, ни в одном из них не удалось нормально настроить управление. Управление разрабам нужно существенно допиливать - например при управлении со Steam Controller оно абсолютно неадекватно, некоторые клавиши просто не нажимаются. При управлении джойстиком раскладка осей совершенно неадекватная (например поворотом джойстика осуществляются не повороты вертолета, а прицеливание!).
Но в целом доволен, с клавиатуры и мыши в аркадном режиме играется очень неплохо.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133683348', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1613812665}
review:

Controls: I use mouse+keyboard , no issues here, it's easy to control the helicopter.

AI: Meh

author: {'steamid': '76561198006354168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1552847903}
review:
Étant fan de tout ce qui se rapproche de près ou de loin les hélicoptères,  ce jeux ne vous décevra pas! 

Pour les novice le mod casual permet de tout simplement tous detruire assez facilement mais en gardant une bonne part de difficultés pour la visée

Etant passè directement apres au mod expert....  Premier décollage, premier crash en meme pas 10 sec! 
Peu-être seul bémol pour ma part j'au entièrement reassignè les toutes les commandes a ma facon, car contrairement au mod casual une erreur et vite arrivé et tres vite fatale si l'emplacement des contrôle est mal faites!  Mais c'est un plus pour le jeux car il rajoute une tres grosse dose de simulation! (Joystick etant HS je ne pourrais vous informez de sont utilité )

Les extensions ne sont a mon goût pas nécessaire sauf si vous voulez au final volé avec un hélicoptère parfois moins bien armé et pratique que le Hind. 

10/10 que ce soit pour le gameplay ,les graphisme et les sensations!

author: {'steamid': '76561198120558189', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1498299177}
review:
If you're looking for a successor to the Comanche series of fat-neckbeard-friendly helo games by Novalogic, this game pretty much covers it. Sure, the campaign missions are placeholder-grade and the briefing is so bad it's not even meme material (it's text only, there's no voice acting as of yet), but at least the built-in editor enables you to create your own apocalyptic extravaganza missions. 

My main complaint is the in-flight rearming feature. It just doesn't fit within a game that allows you to manually aim MCLOS missiles. Having to land at a FARP to rearm should be included among difficulty options. Also, the helo models can get glitchy in some cinematics.

Overall, 7/10 - Needs polishing, but still would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057912903', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 650, 'last_played': 1677395861}
review:
I do believe this is now in my top 10 games list I'll be listing off the reason for this via pros and cons.

Pros
-Air to ground combat is very satisfying. (personally I really enjoy using the the guided missiles and the primary auto cannon)

-The campaign missions take up just the right amount of time thus never feeling long and tedious.

-The game is simple enough that after playing for about 10 or 15 minutes you should have a fairly good grasp on how to play.

-The mission editor is very easy to learn it took me about 30mins to figure out how to make a mission with 4 different objectives.

-CO-OP because who doesn't love unleashing a firestorm on insurgents with a friend.

Cons
-Remeber how I said the missions are great because of how short they are well this creates the problem of being able to fly right through them (pun intended) fairly quickly and being left with instant action which is Alright.

-Air to air can be some what grinding.

-I've played for only 8 hours now but the maps already feel kind of dull now im not saying there ugly or poorly designed they just feel kind of boring now because of how many times I've already seen the same map but for the price of the game the amount of maps you get isn't that bad to be honest.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993974430', 'num_games_owned': 291, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1482108042}
review:
Sou do tempo de jogos desse gênero como comanche 4 que foi um jogo memorável pela sua época, no entanto com uma tocada mais arcade, Air Missions: HIND nos tráz uma tocada no estilo simulador cada estilo de pilotagem vai mudar a forma como vc guia o helicóptero, resta saber o que vc acha mais simples, algumas te limitam um pouco, não é um simulador do tipo vou ligar do zero a aeronave, e cheio de parafernálhas pra se ativar, é mais feito pra diversão, prém com boa física o que te faz sentir em um simulador com gráficos bons, e cenário com vida, desça com o helicóptero perto da grama e verá a agitação da mata, assim como das árvores, é de deixar um FSX com inveja, aqui voar a altura ou entre as árvores vai te dar dano assim como uma turbulência no controle, no começo vc apanha um pouco mas depois se acostuma depois que achei o botão 1 facilitou minha vida nos alvos terrestres, é um jogo com potencial e gostoso de jogar, no entanto está precisando de uma apimentada nas missões que são muito simples e rápidas, vc mal levanta voô e já está no objetivo, não dá nem pra explorar o mapa, aliás quando jogar agora vou ver o limite do mapa, embora seja inútil pois o objetivo é sempre do lado, não te tráz a sensação de aventura e ação como foi comanche 4, não que o jogo seja baseado em ação e aventura e sim focado em missões táticas de forças armadas, porém tudo é muito fácil ficando a maior dificuldade em pilotar o danado mesmo, aceita workshop e tem editor o qual ainda não fuçei mas ao menos é possível encontrar missões a parte e talvez mais requintadas, para um jogo de acesso antecipado está muito bom pelo momento, mas espero um pouco mais ao menos no quesito missões, a física no momento está boa, só achei que precisa de umas balançadinhas a mais no helicóptero, está bem duro, mas está boa a pilotagem mesmo assim, se vc gosta do estilo compre, apesar de ser simulador como gosto, tenho saudade de algo assim como foi o comanche 4 mesmo estilo de pilotagem e jogo, quem sabe um dia lancem um igual, gosto pois era divertido jogar, e também difícil, mas entre os que tenho jogado esse tem sido o melhor na minha opinião, recomendo !
o desenvolvedor disse que vai ter ao menos a linguagem PT no lançamento, não confirmou o PT-br porém também não há necessidade, não há termos técnicos para se aprender a pilotar aqui !

otra boa pedida que está nascendo é o Heliborne que se encontra na steam tambem, mas não vi cockpit e por este motivo continuo com este aqui apesar de parecer ter mais o que fazer no Heliborne

Prós :
Gráfico
Física
Efeitos de solo e de dano
Comprando antes do fim de 2016 ganha-se as DLCs

Contra :
Missões Pequenas e Simples
Pouca Dificuldade

author: {'steamid': '76561198041571110', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 474, 'last_played': 1484480576}
review:
For a start, one thing I love about this game is that it controls very well, even on the most realistic control setting with only a mouse and keyboard so specialized flightsticks, while I am sure they would enhance the experience, are in no way required to enjoy the game.

For an early access game, the most important thing is whether you trust the developer and I am happy to report that the developer has been responsive and made this a truly awesome game!

When I first bought this game, there was NOT an AI to aim the turret or steer the missiles. This meant that when playing the game, I had to simultaneously fly the helicoptor AND aim the chin turret (which was very frustrating on the more realistic control settings.) 

Frankly I was a bit shocked by the lack of an AI to aim the turret and steer missiles because Hind 96 for Windows 95, made about twenty years ago, included an AI known as the silicon WSO to aim the turret and steer missiles. This made the game much more playable, more realistic, and even made the game feel less lonely since hearing the WSO tell you what you had locked onto or saying "lock broken" if you manuvered the helicoptor in such a way that he couldn't aim at the targets made you feel more like the leader of a team as opposed to a lone individual. 

I made a post to this effect, describing the problems I was having and articulating why I though the game would be improved by an optional AI to aim guns and missiles. Although the developer was intially down on the idea of an AI turret gunner, when other players chimed in and supported my idea, the developer listened and added an option to use a turret and missile aiming AI to the game. This made the game much more realistic (since most real helicoptor gunships have crews of two or more in order to make use of turrets, SACLOS type missiles etc.) and much more fun. 

Thanks to the developer's willingness to listen to the players, this is now a great game and one of my very favorites! If you like helicoptors, aircraft, or modern warfare simulators, buy this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561197982805331', 'num_games_owned': 421, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1501170283}
review:
Remember Gaijin's "Apache: Air Assault" (while I'll refer to as Apache:AA)?  This game is the russian helicopter equivalent, possibly even doppleganger.  For an EA game, I'm impressed.  There is no way the authors of this game didn't borrow heavily - but that's a very good thing.

The controls are excellent, even with a gamepad/steam-controller I can fly NOE, dodge, and shoot to my heart's content.
Though I do wish there was head/eye-tracking support, (Apache:AA's shining implementation of the IHADSS was entirely too much fun - it also had a gunner AI)

Framerate is pretty darn good. I'm running it in 4K on an RX480, so there's that.

Sadly, there's also no VR support - which I kinda expect from flying sims.  But there's a cockpit view - so ...there's hope?  


...either way, this game is *great* fun, and seems to have a fleshed-out campaign.  Apache:AA hasn't seen support in years, so this is a really welcome addition.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013621822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1479809232}
review:
ハインドちゃんを乗り回せるので神ゲー

旧ソビエト連邦の有名な攻撃ヘリ「Mi-24ハインド」を題材とした戦闘シム
中央アジア、東欧などのステージを飛び回ろう

操縦モードは「Casual」「Novice」「Pilot」の3種類あり、好みによって切り替えられる。
全体的な雰囲気や操作感としては、エースコン○ットアサルトホライズンのヘリパートや
Operation Flashpoint / ArmAシリーズのヘリ操作時に近いものがある。

また、マルチプレイにも対応しており、キャンペーンもしくは自作ミッションのCoopや、PVPが可能


よいところ
+ 高精細なグラフィック、稼動する計器、格納できる着陸脚、搭載できる兵器のバリエーションなど、かなりのこだわりが見られる。AT-2の手動誘導も再現されているよ！
+ ヘリシムにありがちな難解な操作はなし
+ ミッションの自作が可能
+ オンラインCoop可能
+ 日本語ローカライズ！

いまいちなところ
- 最難度のPilotモード操作であっても簡略化されており、こだわる方には物足りないかもしれない


この価格帯でこのクオリティは素晴らしいの一言。実にハラショーだ。
ソ連兵器スキーな同志諸君、これはマストバイだ。

review: Привет всем. Купил вчера игру (08,10,2016). Полетал,посмотрел,подумал. Ещё раз полетал,посмотрел,подумал. Потом уже пьяный полетал,мало что смотрел,и вообще не думал - просто играл) Не Команч 4 скажу)) Игра - играбельная (ранний доступ),но много чего не хватает. Например графика - на дворе 2016 год ребятааа!!!! Не 2008-ой,а 16-ый!!!!Ну да ладно. Настройки клавиш под себя - чет не понял почему не работают. В миссиях надо бы добавить дружеские базы,чтоб можно было приземлится и подлечить вертушку,да и подзаправить. Русского языка - ох как не хватает. Я то ладно,худо бедно но понимаю что к чему,а ну как пень какой нибудь за штурвал сядет? Он же вообще ничего не поймёт) Ладно - шутка. ГРАФИКУ!!!!! ЗАБАБАХАЙТЕ ГРАФИКУ!!!! И МИССИЙ БОЛЬШЕ!!!! КАК МОЖНО БОЛЬШЕ. С мультиком вообще ничего не понятно. Пробовал - нет никого. И да,где то у кого то читал - свободный обзор из кабины пилота - надо доработать. А то вместе с вертушкой крутишся.А ещё кстати,сам вертолёт можно было бы чуть дальше сделать,а то он практически всё перекрывает. ГРАФИКУ!!!!! А,про это я же говорил... Кароче ребзя - игрушка про вертушку - забавная,интересная,где то лёгкая,местами не очень. Одним словом - любителям данных игор - MUST HAVE. А так как  она ещё в стадии разработки - боюсь представить,что они (разработчики) ещё туда насуют.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972244201', 'num_games_owned': 628, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 1383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 916, 'last_played': 1698621000}
review:
I'm a lifelong simulation player and HIND is just simmy enough to scratch my realism itch, while still providing enough moment-to-moment action to appeal to my pure gamer side too. It supports joysticks and gamepads, but the keyboard+mouse control implementation is amazingly well-executed too. 

This isn't a hardcore sim by any definition, but it's a perfect example of quick-fix air combat gaming. Give it a shot! The first two difficulty levels are perfect for new players, and the "Pilot" mode is reasonably simmy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169180048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 825, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1491138398}
review:
Absolutely marvelous
Graphics are great.
Explosions and effects look fantastic and very real.
Whole helicopter has all the weight You need to feel when flying on Pilot Dificulty.
Weapons systems are a pure Joy to operate.
With fully customisable controls I've set it up in a way that allows me and my son fly the same helicopter ,Him as a pilot and me as a Weapons Officer with literally no limitations.
And with both cockpits available in a touch of a switch there is a lot of roleplay possible.
Sound is top notch.
Fan of a Hind or not its a must have.
Cons? Well there is still not much content but its a WIP So I dont mind.
Game is growing.Development is Solid.
On top of my wishlist right now is a replay option that would allow me to watch all them EPIC battles we go through with my Son.
Devs.....Big thanks for a game like this.

review:
EXCELLENT jeu ! 
Les hélicos sont bien réalisés quoiqu'un peu grossiers à mon gout, les cockpits virtuels sont magnifiques mais manquent d'éclairages lors des vols de nuit. Les terrains sont splendides et participent beaucoup à l'immersion dans le jeu, dommage que l'eau soit si peu réaliste, je pense que les vagues ne sont pas à la bonne échelle...
Les commandes sont un peu fantaisistes mais une fois maitrisées on n'y prête plus attention, c'est loin d'être une simulation hardcore mais quel fun, c'est assez rare et ça mérite d'être souligné. Même si beaucoup de choses sont encore perfectibles on est pris dans le feu de l'action et on ne voit pas le temps passer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065740505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1589095038}
review:
So far in EA, Air Missions: HIND lacks some polish, needs to change some fonts and get to do some serious work on the campaign aspect. Which is really not that bad for EA - especially since the hard part, flying, is aced. HINDs feel very good to fly. The line between arcade and simulation is set so that it's easy to get into - and yet you still get to enjoy helicopter-specific maneuverability. While you can play it like a "tank in 3d space" on easiest control mode, the highest one gives you enough realism to feel just right.

As of now (v0.63) the value proposal as-is is lacking - as can be expected in NA obviously. Nevertheless the game has really good prospects - with just a few additions of more "instant-action" missions replay-ability would jump through the roof. A few more options here, a few difficulty settings there, some challenges and new missions - is all the game needs, and the framework is already there and working.

All in all, while a lot of work and love is still needed, the game shows a very good promise and - more importantly - Dev team seems to be well within the ability to provide.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198130998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1504339323}
review:
This is a great game, love it!

My full English review is here: http://grandpagaming.blogspot.nl/2016/05/air-missions-hind-review-english.html
Mijn volledige Nederlandse Beoordeling is hier: http://grandpagaming.blogspot.nl/2016/05/air-mission-hind-review-nederlands.html

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ftBPFSsnKqk

My conclusion:  If you like helicopters and flight simulators, this is an excellent game to get. It's fun to fly, but it can get challenging at times. There are a number of flight modes, suiting novice and expert pilots. It's not a full simulator, but not arcade either, it's a good mix. The graphics are good and everything is very responsive. It's fun to play now and I assume it can only get better. My verdict? This early access game gets a 8 out of 10. It's good, but there is room to improve as well.

Mijn conclusie: Houd je van helikopters of vluchtsimulaties, dan is dit een uitstekend spel om te hebben. Een plezier om te vliegen, maar kan wel uitdagend zijn. Er zijn een aantal vluchtmodes, van beginnende piloot tot aan expert. Het is geen volledige simulator, maar ook geen arcade, het is een goede mix van beide. Grafisch is het spel goed en alles reageert prima. Het is nu al leuk om te spelen en zal, naar ik aanneem, alleen maar beter worden. Mijn beoordeling? Dit spel in vroegtijdige toegang krijgt can mij een 8 van de 10. Het is goed, maar er is zeker ruimte voor verbetering.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149006018', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1503939460}
review:
This is FUN, easy to play and looks great! I have been flying hardcore, realistic flight sims for decades and thought that this might be too "arcade". It's not! You can adjust the settings to make it as you wish it to be. As a fixed wing guy, helos are strange critters to me but this makes it easy to get on to flying rotors. It's a good deal for the price and the learning curve to get started isn't steep. Great for those who don't have a lot of time to devote to mastering a sim. Even if there are no more updates, it's still a good deal. 

These folks hit the sweet spot between arcade and realistic. Perfect choice of ride because the Hind is the big bad boy of helos. Runs great on Windows 10 without a high end graphics card. You can tweak the eye candy for what looks best and runs most smoothly with your rig.

Go blow stuff up and have FUN!

类似于以前出的Apache Air assault，同类型游戏，但是阿帕奇在Steam上没有售，去年在青睐之光上就注意到这个游戏一直关注着，最近突然想起来一看已经出了就果断买了。

多人模式不同于阿帕奇，不是我想的那样一机双人合作，而是一人一机。
已通关，总体来说还不错，还有待提升。

author: {'steamid': '76561198008737053', 'num_games_owned': 5218, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1459589230}
review:
Air Missions: HIND is a action combat flight simulator game what based on one the most iconic and popular helicopter what been created in Soviet Union: Mi-24 Hind.

When you start to play a single player mode, you will find here 3 options, a campaign, instant action and test fly. When you start a camping, first this give a small tutorial, where you can learn a basic controls. After when you passed tutorial you will start a real missions. All missions based at fictional conflicts, when you passing them you will meet some areas like a Central Asia or Eastern Europe. After complected mission you will unlock new weapons what you can set up to your helicopter. Before all mission you can easily customize a difficulty level and change your device weapons. This game have a multiplayer and coop feature also, but unfortunately now you will not find to much players online.
The game graphic good, looks enough realistic.  

So my verdict

+ realistic graphic
+ good sounds
+ well detailed helicopters
+ good helicopter customization
+ easy to control
+ easily can set up a difficulty
+ coop and multiplayer
+ steam achievements
+ leaderboards

- some bugs- game undiscovered at this time, so in multiplayer you will find only few players
- a bit hard to aim
- no trading cards

This game now in Early Access and have enough good potential to be a good and enjoyable combat flight simulator game. However this not a big developer studio, they´re already does a good work, because a game at now have enough much advantages like a realistic graphic, good controls, good difficulty customization etc. I easily can recommend for you this game, especially if you like flight games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970964862', 'num_games_owned': 3790, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1459152205}
review:
Thanks Fantis for the key:

Primero me gustaría decir que me encantan este tipo de juegos. ( Ya y a mi que me importa diréis) xD. Ya. Pero tenía que decirlo.

Con lo cuál voy a ser lo más objetivo posible a la hora de evaluar este juego.

A priori te acaban de destinar a una base Rusa, después de varios años de entrenamiento en la cuál te van a entregar tu precioso "Tanque aéreo". Mil Mi-24 "Hind". Sólo saber eso ya te extremeces.

Pero claro no has pilotado nunca este helicóptero. Con lo cual vamos a tomar las primeras horas de vuelo en tu nuevo pájaro.

Los controles son básicos, ya que no es un simulador puro (Ojala), pero para eso ya tenemos otros juegos. Este es muy parecido al "Apache" y al "Havoc" antiguos. Pero a éste le han lavado la cara, y mucho.

En las primeras misiones nos ensenaran el modo de pilotaje, y las distintas armas disponibles, que hay un montón para escoger. Pero al inicio solo tendremos la ametralladora del morro y dos bahías laterales, bajo ala. Que cargaremos cohetes,

Una vez hechas las misiones de entrenamiento. Nos dispondremos a hacer nuestra primera misión real, que es destruir unos antiaéreos enemigos en una ciudad cercana a nuestra base.Para ello dispondremos de una escuadra de dos "Hind" más que nos ayudaran a completar la misión.

Terminada ésta, nos recompensarán con varias armas adicionales. misiles, cohetes guiados, bombas, etc. Que iremos consiguiendo en misiones sucesivas.

El multijugador y el Co-op. Aún no los he probado, Pero debe ser impresionante. Ya os contaré en una review a posteriori.

El juego dispone de varias vistas. (6) Que a la hora de combatir, deberas escoger la que mejor te convenga en tu modo de juego. En mi caso es la vista desde la cabina. Que está fantásticamente recreada.

Deciros también, que el juego tiene, logros, pero no cartas (aún).

En cuanto al sonido, es realmente bueno, y la música ambiente también.

Para ser un early access, este juego esta muy avanzado.

Mi enhorabuena.

ala hasta luego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037254843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1707065929}

author: {'steamid': '76561198021145114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 925, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1690395895}
review:
Bello, divertente,graficamente ottimo, sound bello e fisica di volo discreta. 
Peccato questo peso della bilancia piu su arcade che sim. Peccato perche in giro non c'e' nessun sim di elicottero da guerra, dal periodo di Apache longebow.
Spero nei prossimi aggiornamenti che la bilancia passi dalla parte del sim, come almeno, far  terminare le missioni rientrando alla base con atterraggio, magari con una mappa radar nei strumenti della cabina di volo e non con una sfumata al menu triste, il rientro alla base per un pilota o comunque per un appassionato di volo militare e' bellissimo e fondamtale.
Comunque per cominciare, siamo sulla buona strada, spero solo che, per lo meno ci siano due opzioni arcade o sim.
Ad esempio chi predilige il sim, le visuali esterne sono ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh, come per un appassionato di sim racing utilizzare la visuale della macchina dall'esterno (pietà) ecco. almeno che si possa distinguere con un menu le due cose:
vuoi vedere l'elicottero da fuori e fare quello che vuoi oppure vuoi vedere i strumenti e vedere il mondo dall'interno con tutti i rischi e pericoli di una missione di guerra con un elicottero hind?
Bravi comunque non esiste niente del genere ora in giro.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018214616', 'num_games_owned': 1252, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1459001762}
review:
[h1][b]Public Review on behalf of the Opium Pulses Steam group[/b][/h1]

[b]Disclaimer[/b]: The copy of this game was provided by the developer for review purposes, yet it doesn't affect my review in any way.

[b]Few words about the game[/b]
Air Missions: HIND is an amazing combat flight simulator, where you're being deployed into various battlefields to accomplish the commanded missions. I may have no experience with this kind of games as I played only one combat simulator before, but I easily recognize a good game when I play one and this is definitely one of those.

[b]Advantages[/b]
[list]
[*] - Graphics are not breathtaking, but still very nicely done and the models are pretty realistic
[*] - Big variety of weapons to customize your helicopter
[*] - Diversity of missions and surrounding makes it very interesting to play and quite hard to get bored of
[*] - Sounds are realistic and well done
[*] - Steering is very good, whether it's on the keyboard and mouse or on the XBOX pad. Also the control over the vehicle is precise, it takes a while to master it but it's very rewarding
[*] - Multiplayer has a huge potential, hope I'll get to try it out soon
[*] - Developers are active and respond to any kind of feedback, it's always very nice to see it
[/list]

[b]Disadvantages[/b]
[list]
[*] - Music is in very low quality and it's very repetitive
[*] - Multiplayer is dead for now so there's no option to test out multiplayer or co-op. But the game is still fresh and early access so I think we can "turn a blind eye" to it
[*] - I occurred few crashes, but the reasons are unknown
[/list]

[b]Summary[/b]
I'm not really a helicopters nor simulators enthusiast, so it's somehow new experience playing this kind of game and reviewing it, but from my point of view, the game is awesome! Control over chopper is smooth and feels realistic and controls overlay is thought through. Graphics are good, sounds are good, only music could use kind of an upgrade. One thing I can't wait for is multiplayer, I have a feeling that it's going to be big and awesome. Unfortunately, it's dead right now so we will wait a while for it to gain some publicity. The game is on Early Access right now so don't expect miracles and instantly an 3xA content, missions are fun and varied, but lacks any deeper content so there's still a long way full of updates to the finished game. But the good news was that developers are active, bug I occurred yesterday is fixed now, so I'm really looking forward to see how the game will develop soon. If you have 14 euro lying around, go for this game, it's worth for what it offers right now and will be even more worth for the full version of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000593899', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1488976785}
review:
お手軽にハインドを飛ばせるのが楽しいタイトル。
開発中なので要望多めでレビュー。

フルクリッカブルなコクピットで飛ばすフライトシムは大仰で手を出しにくいけど、気軽にヘリを飛ばしてみたいプレイヤーにオススメ。
一番難度の高いパイロットでも挙動はカジュアル、空に敷かれた見えないレールを辿ってるようであまり浮いている感覚はない。最高難度はもっと飛ばしにくくて良いと思う。

アーリーアクセスの海外作品にも関わらず日本語対応していることに驚いた。
そんなに難しいことは言ってないと思うけど字幕はありがたい。
漢字の使い方はちょっと怪しいけど許せる範囲。

ここからは要望を列挙していく。

・空中で武器リロードできる通常モードの他に基地に戻って補給しなければならないモードがあるとなお良い。

・アーケードよりの手軽なシミュレーターでコクピット視点はおまけなのはわかるけど、コクピット視点の計器をちゃんと動かして欲しい。

・キー配置はコンフィグ画面で確認できるようにしてほしい。

・まだ試してないから実際は対応済みなのかもしれないけれど、TrackIRに対応してくれると嬉しい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198017693359', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1472592669}
review:
Seriously this game is great. It has some beautiful visuals and if you love the Hind Helicopters then this is for you. This game is going to be very interesting to see when fully completed. The game is easy to jump into and is not some flight sim where you need to spend 2 hours just learning to take off (which isnt a bad thing, Im just saying if thats what youre looking for then this wont be for you)

Pros

Very nice looking
Simple to get into
Lots of combat 
Great weapons

Cons

Short, very short. Only 8 missions but hopefully more in the near future
It would be nice to have another camera mode so you can watch fly bys and action shots
AI is quite stupid and inneffective at trying to engage you....

All in all I would try this game if you like a quick combat flight sim with great visuals and quick action!

author: {'steamid': '76561198033082952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1458840820}
review:
Игра не понравилась вообще!
Управление жуть (постоянно путаешься в кнопках, не удачно сделано). В игре Heliborne можно угол тангажа задать мышкой, какой тебе нужен, а здесь все реализовано на одних кнопках, кроме поворотов.
Как вертолёт может так быстро взлетать вверх, будто он на катапульте, или это не настоящий вертолёт вовсе?
В Heliborne хоть чувствуется масса настоящего вертолёта, а здесь словно как игрушка на пульт-управления.
Камера вообще непонятно куда воткнули, нет возможности свободного обзора не влияя на курс полёта вертолёта.
Графика ужасна (чего стоит растягивающиеся текстуры деревьев вблизи). 
В мультиплейере непонятно чего делать: противники не сбиваются, повреждения не получают, тупо летаешь как дурак. Непонятно что надо делать.
Да и вообще игра скучна. 
Единственный плюс в игре, так это вид из кабины сделан идеально.

Рекомендую пока только игру Heliborne: http://store.steampowered.com/app/433530
Как исправят недочеты, то сразу поменяю оценку.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993226799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1439, 'last_played': 1524954523}
review:
First Impressions - This is GREAT!  

If you liked cockpit-view semi-simulation flight games like (going way back) Gunship 2000, Commanche, Battlefield 2, etc just buy this, it's the Heli game you have been waiting for.  Even in it's current alpha state this game has all the base elements you want in a flight game:  Great Physics & Graphics, lots of controller options, a variety of views including a fully rendered cockpit (my preferred view) and gunner seat, FLIR and several external views, great Co-Op, PvP and team PvP, Single Skirmish, Campaign Mode and Free Flight.  Add to that chunky explosions, rag-doll infantry, custom loadouts, and just the right amount of simulation without being over-the-top realism.

I'm not going to dwell on the current lack of content because this is the first public early-release of the game and the missions that are included are a promising snapshot of the direction the content developers are heading.  From what I have seen so far I have complete confidence that the future content will only get better.  

I bought this game along with 2 friends and we got to play all multiplayer modes together, all were extremely satisfying.  We all use Logitech 3D Extreme flight sticks that were recognized, configured, and worked almost perfectly by default.  Every feature of the Heli fits neatly on the stick so no need for mouse at all.  Even the menus can be navigated using the hat and a few buttons on the stick... very slick!  If you like to cusomize your controls, no problem, there is a full suite of custom options  including both Primary and Secondary controller recognition that has rudder and throttle-stick pilots in mind.  I also tried the keyboard-mouse controls (in Pilot mode) and found it extremely accessible to the flight-stick challenged, so don't be discouraged mouse-flyers, this game is for you too!

I'm happy to see this genre being properly resurrected and so far so good.  My friends and I are really enjoying replaying the current limited content and looking forward to what this developer will deliver in the coming months.   A sound purchase at $13 US, support these guys.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970598485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1458798987}
review:
全般的にチープな部分もあるゲームだが、根本的にバリュー帯ゲームなので、
それをわかったうえで購入するならば、普通におススメできるタイトルである

＝＝　操作感　＝＝
操作系は、「カジュアル」、「新人」、「パイロット」の3段階から選べる
カジュアルは、おそらく初心者に配慮したモードで、ヘリが主人公のTPSに近い操作系
新人は、航空機っぽい挙動になるが、慣性制御が強力でやたら操作性の高い操作系
パイロットは、新人と同じ操作だが、慣性がより強くかかる操作系になっている

問題に感じるのは、ヘリ独特のコレクティブ操作の表現が甘く、
横に滑らそうとしても、すぐにロールに入ってしまう点
「高度を維持しつつ、横滑りで回り込む」みたいなヘリ的操縦が難しくなっている
前進方向に慣性をつけて横を向けば一応可能だが、何か違う感がでてしまう

なお、使うキーの種類は多くなく、キーボード＋マウスでも快適にプレイできる
また、キーバインドも自由に変えることもできる


＝＝　グラフィック、サウンド　＝＝
グラフィックオプションの設定は、ある程度の項目に細分化されており、
好みや、マシンの性能に応じての調整が可能
最も軽い設定にした場合は、もちろん軽快で、それでいてそこそこ綺麗
4年前のPCでも60fps出るので、PCゲームとしてのバランス感覚はよい

サウンドは特別よくも悪くもない品質だが、外連味に欠け、映画音響を基準に考えるとチープに感じるだろう


＝＝　ゲーム内容　＝＝
早アクの段階で30～40%の完成度とのことだが、キャンペーンとフリーミッション的なモードで遊べる
キャンペーンの内容はよく言えばシンプルで、出撃して目標を倒すみたいなものが多い
悪く言えば簡素であり、途中でイベントが発生するなどの、複雑なシナリオ展開にはなっていない

弾薬の概念はあり、例えば16連装のロケットポッドであれば、16発で弾切れになる
ただし、空中でのリロードが何回か可能なので、実際のハインド数機分の弾薬搭載量になる
もっとも、相手にする敵の数も現実離れした数なので、実質撃ち放題という恰好にはならない

ダメージは地形や建造物との接触時のものをオプションで設定できる
例えば、木に触れた場合は少しダメージを受けるが、建物に触れた場合は墜落するなどの設定が可能

review:
Начало 2016 года несомненно радует любителей вертолетов. В скудный список симуляторов и аркад про эти замечательные и тенически сложные летательные машины добавилась еще парочка, можно сказать, "весенних ласточек". Пройдя недолгую (на момент написания обзора игра в раннем доступе) компанию и все доп. миссии на уровне сложности пилот, замечу, что игра вполне самобытна, управление достойное и чувствуется вес машины, графика напоминает "армовскую" (не хватало свободного просмотра в кабине). Мультиплеер с высоким порогом вхождения, в помощь "иглы" и подвесные пулеметы. Очень хочется увидеть в будующем больше кооперативных миссий, более сложного и разнобразного противника, детальных визуальных и физических повреждений нашей "Лани", влияния на погодные условия.

Рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023981082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1698598075}
review:
This game is hilarious, like really really hilarious. It's kinda like those helicopter sections from Ace Combat Assault Horizon, but without the setpieces, scripted events and fancy missile dodges.
You control a Mi-24 Hind gunship, one of the meanest sight anyone could ever see in their airspace.
You control your war chariot either with keyboard and mouse which I haven't used or a 360/Xbone pad which works surprisingly well and the controls, even on pilot setting, are extremely easy to master and effective. You'll be doing sideways strafing runs on opfor camps like nobodys bussines.

The game, being in early alpha, is a bit prone to crash here and there. I noticed that if you enable steam overlay while the game is loading, it gets stuck once the game reaches the "press any button to continue" part, meaning you have to forcibly turn off the game from the task manager.
There are also a bit of bugs, nothing too major though. For example, if you run out of ammo for a weapon like a gunpod for example, and hold the trigger down, the screen contiues to shake like it was firing.
All the enemies look like WWII Americans. This is not a bug really, maybe either a developer oversight, a place holder or we actually are fighing evil imperialistic Americans trying to invade the motherland.

The game is loads of fun though, raining down death and hatred from your unstoppable war chariot.

For the current price of 16 or so dollaridoos, this game was worth it in my opinion if you want some light helicoter combat simulator action without going too techincal or too arcadey, a perfect balance of both. It is kinda short thought, like you can play though the campaign in a hour or two short. There is instant action to keep you occupied too, but at 16 bucks you could ask for a bit more than 2 hours.

Now go forth and become MArs, Mara, Izanami, Hel or whatever for you are become death, the destroyer of worlds.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049445273', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2771, 'last_played': 1674867517}
review:
Being a massive Mi-24 fan this was a must for me despite being 'arcade'. My biggest fear was that it would be like Heleborne but fortunately it's not that arcady. The controls are simplified vs a real helicopter but they still feel enough like the real thing to make you feel like you're flying.
The graphics are really nice and the maps well put together, though some of them could be bigger, and it would be nice if there was a map view so you could see your location and have some idea of when you're going to hit the edge.
The model of the Mi-24 is really nicely done though it does have some quirks. The nose landing gear retracts in a really odd manner though this is nit picking as it's hardly noticeable.
The game runs super smooth, the maps load really fast and the only drop in framerate I experiened was when firing the podded Yak-B gatling guns over the largest city. That was earlier in developement and after a year it now runs perfectly smooth in all conditions.
Usually I'm not a fan of combat in flying games, I just like flying around, however this games battles are really fun, especially the quick mission city attacks. It's actually quite challenging a lot of the time and I am really struggling to get to grips with the guided missles.
Despite the name other Soviet/Russian helicopters have been added to the game which is very appreciated. My only problem with these is that the cockpits of the Mi-28 and Ka-50 are basically unfinished with little detail and many dead guages and screens. The Mi-8 cockpit is better though it seems to be based on some weird Westernised modification to the standard Mi-8 cockpit.
Watching the game develope has been very satisfying. The developers have really listened to the community and I actually feel like i've had some input into the final product.
